comments: I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

Great game, been playing for five months now and have managed to get all but 5 hero's unlocked. Lots of chances to save up radios for hero calls and love the different types of game especially the guild.  Haven't spent a penny on it and don't think you need to if you have a little patience and use your resources wisely.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.

Great time waster. Wish the gas would increase quicker. Hero's are pretty easy to get after a while. Freemium aspects of the game not shoved down your throat they are there but not essential (So far) LVL 25

Quite addictive however you need to learn how to play this game. It's difficult at first. SINCE LAST UPDATE GAME RESTARTS AFTER EVERY MOVE! WILL FIX MY RATING WHEN THIS ISSUE IS FIXED. IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO PLAY

descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms

For player support, please visit:
nextgames.helpshift.com
recentChanges: The Walking Dead Season 8 missions continue every Monday! Watch the episode, play through the memorable moments the next day in No Man‚Äôs Land and earn Rick tokens along the way.
Gather your guild and explore the new ‚ÄúIn the Dead of Night‚Äù challenge.
The update includes many bug fixes and performance improvements.
summary: Play AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead! Complete Episode 1 and unlock Daryl to your team!
title: The Walking Dead No Man's Land

comments: I first got this game because it seemed interesting and whatnot, but I then completed the tutorial and went on to race other people but when I pressed the race button, I lost 20 energy but I didn't go on to race anyone or do anything else really. I then pressed to race button again and again and nothing happened other than me losing all of my energy. I don't know why this happened but I'd like compensation, thank you.

Was a great game but is all messed up now.  Freezing, dropping, can barely even get races to start.  Don't know what happened but it needs to be fixed back to the way it used to be. If fixed would be all 5 stars.

I'm fed up of this game taking away my energy but not even putting me in a race! And I don't even get reimbursed for it! It connects and puts me in a race sometimes but nobody is there.... or sometimes it just glitches before putting me in to the race.......... sort it out. I'm deleting this bull.
Few glitches where it takes fuel, then never starts a race search.   But it isn't bad if I've played every day since I downloaded it.  34 consecutive days so far!

Hard to rate higher than one when it's so bugged that you can't actually race. Fix the bugs so it becomes playable again. New update just made it worse. Real shame as this is a cool game when it works.

It's a cool name. I'd like it if I could play it. But I run out of energy afternoon racing once. It goes it and either doesn't find opponents or it does then freezes and it wasted all my energy every time. Thumbs down

comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game
It was ok, but limiting the amount of lives behind a pay wall or timer was a weird choice
Love this game. Addicted already and find the name of the fire crackers amusing. Music is good and not annoying.

descriptionHTML:
Be Ben, be an alien, be the hero! Are You Ready?

In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. Then take on Zombozo and his robots in 360-degree augmented reality action!

With Ben 10 Alien Experience you get two apps in one, a super cool face swapper and an action-packed robot blaster. Use your device’s camera and see the transformation take place in front of your very eyes as you become one of Ben Tennyson’s amazing alien forms.

Warm things up as Heatblast and experience his fiery powers or chill out as Diamondhead and see icicles appear all around you! Become Stinkfly and shoot out slime balls or smash things up as Four Arms. Take photos and record short videos straight to your device before sharing them with family and friends!

The fun doesn’t end once you transform! Take your device and save the day from waves enemies that only you can see. Use your alien’s powers to defend yourself from Zomboso and his robots in augmented reality gameplay. Use your device as a radar to find and destroy endless hordes of enemies in exciting 360-degree action.

It’s Hero Time!

**********

This game is available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Arabic, Czech, Norwegian, Portuguese, Turkish and Greek.

If you're having any problems, contact us at apps.emea@turner.com. Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using. This app may contain ads for Cartoon Network & our partners’ products & services.


**********

comments: Love the detail of going down to nut and bolts practically to do repairs. Two bones of contention:  The timer to access new barns is too long, does not make for satisfying game play. Also, after purchasing a tool upgrade, I was pleased to see a longer list of repairs gained. Great. Except I couldn't remove the fuel pump to remove the fuel tank. It said my tools needed upgrading for that one part. Please fix that bug so all repairs needed can be made with tool set level.

It's a good game with room for improvement, I've leveled up my tools to level 4 but it's so annoying when it says tools need to be upgraded, this need to be  improved. All so when you fix a vehicle the money could be upped a bit more. I know you can re-paint the vehicle but I wish you could improve the wheels and the interior of the vehicle to make some more money. The other thing that the other paint uses coins how about instead or all so to pay for the other paint with the in game money.

Well let's see ..played the game fixed 7 cars and I made about $70,000 on the game I bought another car and had to replace just about all the parts on it I bought all the parts and was in the process of putting all the parts on it and in the middle of that ,the game shut down on me I opened it back up to continue playing and it had started back over from the beginning at the tutorial and I lost all progress. y'all need to fix this. until this is fixed and or I am put back where I was on the game then I would not recommend downloading this game or any of the other mechanic games for 2018, much less even playing it. it's a waste of time and data also had a trouble with the other 2018 version mechanic game you will see a posting on that one where it's not giving enough time to fix panels and it's not registering clicking on panels to find out if anything's messed up on them .thanks for the problems and the issues. This game is on this phone of mine and the other game is on my other phone developers. You'll see a post on the other garage mechanic 2018 game by Wesley wright. Yaw need to fix these issues ok , because these bad ratings I have been seeing by others isn't looking good for you games.

Game is great but I would've loved some more features or more cars it gets repetitive real fast please add more features like OBD SCAN or inside car customizations also pc version you can change rims and wheels lights bumpers and add more cars not saying you should add all that but maybe some if possible to make it less repetitive
"Breaks" is misspelled, and the photo button is in German or something. Cool game, can really help someone learn how a car works.

descriptionHTML:
Buzz Subway Lightyear is an amazing running game for Android. Run along the craziest scenarios in the Buzz Subway Lightyear. Drag to jump or slide and to move left or right. Avoid hitting trucks, buses and subway trains. Run around the Bus city, subway, forest and beach and gather all the coins you can.


The Buzz Subway Lightyear Store has lots of items to improve your running performance. Get runner upgrades to improve your power ups (including magnets and boots). Upgrade your jetpack too, and get lots of coins. You can also purchase Boards to surf mid-air and survive obstacle hits —whether you hit buses, trucks or even subway trains!

Buzz Subway Lightyear also gives you the chance of getting amazing gifts. Collect your daily gift each day and open mystery boxes to get some special rewards!

Buzz Subway Lightyear is a very fun runner game. Download it now and start running!

Features:

- City included!
- Bonus stage implemented!
- New character included!
- 10 characters for you to choose and surf the city!
- Amazing power-ups: coin magnet, jetpack, super jump, score multiplier and air-surfing boards!
- Trucks, buses and subway trains to avoid!
- Lots of obstacle-dodging fun!
- Daily gift

Buzz Subway Lightyear is a very fun runner game. Download it now and start running!

descriptionHTML:
This is a football game designed specifically for football players score!

Subversion of the traditional game mode, the combination of rugby and mobile phones, open up new ways to play!

This rugby game is free and fast-paced game, come and become a real rugby player!

Game features:
◆ 16 football teams can choose, you can join any of them;
◆ Suitable for Android 2.3 above all the equipment;
◆ 2 kinds of game modes: tutorial mode, fast game mode;
◆ no network, anytime, anywhere, want to play to play;
◆ game free to adjust the length of time: 3 minutes, 5 minutes, 10 minutes;
◆ You can choose to compete with 15 teams to decide who is the highest scorer.

Gameplay:
◆ Tilt the phone control role around turn;
◆ Click the left and right offset button, control the role of left and right offset;
◆ click around dodge button, dodge around the control of the role;
◆ Click the acceleration button to speed up running.

Whether you are an experienced rugby player or a newbie you will love this game!

Join a different Rugby Championship and lead your team to the trophy!

Come and download this free and funny game!

description: Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!The warriors claim your name, lord!Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.Features:-  Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.-  +1500 defensive waves.-  4 Heroes to unlock.-  +100 territories to conquer.-  +30 soldiers to upgrade.-  +1000 building upgrades.-  4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).-  15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.
descriptionHTML:
Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.

The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.

Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.

The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!

The warriors claim your name, lord!

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

Features:

- Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.
- +1500 defensive waves.
- 4 Heroes to unlock.
- +100 territories to conquer.
- +30 soldiers to upgrade.
- +1000 building upgrades.
- 4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).
- 15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.

9709 Kenneth Oren drive
Charlotte, NC 28213
United States

title: Game of Warriors

descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

comments: I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.

It's a good attempt but too easy to die. No water. Seriously? I have an empty bottle yet nothing to put in it. I would like the chance to explore and build BEFORE I die five times and can't reclaim the stuff I've spent time collecting.  If these things are remedied I'll try again. Till then, deleting.

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Very good idea but lack of some stuff like improvements. Right now the demolition system not work and we cannot move the walls or floors. The energy should be more sustainable and will be good if the trees on the base and some stuff randomly spawn. I will drop the game for now and on the future i Will give another shoot

The game is ok.. i love the idea.. but in all RPG and similar games you can accuire your items from when you died from your body in that zone.. also its good when you enter the inventory to pause the game.. when entering a zone the game should give some time before reseting the material and monsters if the player re-enters the same zone.. These are the most critical points so far i have encountered.. please take these in consideration.. thank you
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!‚óè EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors‚Äô castles to obtain the most valuable resources.‚óè LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands‚Äô most dangerous inhabitants.‚óè IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don‚Äôt forget to explore your enemies‚Äô territory to collect valuable loot.‚óè DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.‚óè OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.‚óè BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.‚óè JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.‚óè PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you‚Äôll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.‚óè RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There‚Äôs always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that‚Äôs the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.‚óè SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire‚Äôs ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
recentChanges: ‚Äî Invisible character issue on some devices is fixed
‚Äî Game progress saving system is improved
‚Äî Rare case with empty event chests is fixed
‚Äî An issue with other exiles' corpses disappearance is fixed
‚Äî The Night Guest now comes later and less frequently
summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog‚Äôs race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. comments: GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

I really think the tower is rigged. 1 in 4 chance of getting the pig but it seems to happen ALL the time. Cant get past the 6th or 7th floor. However if you spend lots o money to buy gems I guess it can be done. Not for me I am out.

Can no longer watch ads to get an extra rewards chest plus, I logged in for 90 days and did not get my legendary chest. My screen froze up when I hit the claim button and had to restart my game. Now my chest is gone and the next level has appeared without me being able to chose what I wanted from the chest.

Caution! Needed access to my personal files including photos to play the game.  I denied and could not start the game unless it had access. Uninstalling after this review.  Don't let programmers and hackers get a hold of your personal files!

Graphics are good, game play can be lame at times when you get birds that are incapable of completing the level. You can't buy the game and that bothers me. I spent $20, (to support the effort) but am trying to keep it at that.  Others have spent $100 and more. Greed ruins this game. Just finished a level that was designed to be beat only by spending money. Spent hours trying but finally paid and beat it. The game play is not consistent. If you have a bad day it will let you win, if you're winning, suddenly an opponent that should never be able to beat you, kicks your ass when you've played perfectly.

It won't let me watch videos. Every time I click on the TV to watch a video for a free bird or arena ticket, it restart the game instead and I lose a life. I hope this gets fixed because other then that it's an addictive game. When the Glitch is fixed I will give a better rating.

descriptionHTML:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?

CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!
It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!

NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

SPECTACULAR SPELLS!
Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

comments: So I played it on my iPhone e and loved it. Recently o got a new phone and it's am android. I connected to my Nintendo account and loaded it up. My world seem to be it good shape everything there like in my IPhone but when I went to tour only world one was available. I'm not going to spend another ten dollars to unlock what I already beat so please fix it I wanna keep enjoying this gamr

Love this game and love the nostalgia but there is no way I'm paying ¬£9.99 to level up on any game ever let alone one where a single tap on the screen is the only player interaction. Even with direction control etc like the old days wouldn't make it worth the price being asked.

I have had a very long conversation with someone at the hq and I was talking about the worlds. I bought the worlds on my iPad and downloaded Mario run on this device Android. I ask why my worlds that I purchased on my iPad aren't here. They don't connect that purchase with Nintendo account. When they connect everything else. I told them I am not paying twice so that brings down the rating for me for this game. But great fun and very enjoyable, but get the linking fixed. Seems a bit of a design flaw

Super Mario run is a great smartphone game it has the very addicting toad rally and remix ten and the simple, but very rewarding controls. The kingdom builder is a good addition but is kinda unnecessary. The only big problem I have with it is that it has to always be online. I give super Mario run 8.5/10 stars

Its good fun but extra world tour levels are needed to sell the full game, both after purcgase and before. But if you delve into the crevices of each mode and extract every bit of play you'll find out whether it's worth it

I beat world 1, and I have to pay for the rest of the game? Really? This is stupid.. If you're going to have a game you need to pay for, market it as such, not the ol bait and switch. Very deceitful.. At least make a trial game or demo game not lure someone in and then tell them they need to pay to finish the game

descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
recentChanges: „Éª Added a Skip button to opening tutorial.
Remix 10, made of some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play, is here!
There are also some brand-new courses, a new playable character, and a new feature that lets you listen to your favorite music while you play!
Why not try out the updated Super Mario Run?

comments: Pretty good for finding it on Facebook. I'm liking it so far, but there's no tutorial or anything like it, so you're on your own figuring things out. Some item descriptions aren't in English, and the text after you gain things in combat for gold and souls goes too fast. Still don't know what it's saying.   Would recommend though just for a quick thing to do when you're bored and have time to kill.

A hidden gem. Premium currency is handed out in enough amounts to buy important things. Easy enough to figure out but a lack of a tutorial could turn away some. Only reason I took a star away because musketeer class line has high dex and str scaling skills..??

A surprising find, i really don't expected this game to have this level of quality. This game successfully give me the feeling of discovery and exploration while in expeditions, and i feel compelled to build and better the manor. But a disappointment is how there are no differences between characters other than their classes and aesthetics.

This game is great takes a little wile to figure out but it is no way a pay to play you have the option to buy gems that help u acheive things faster. Its not much of a grind either to acheive things that are less common with that said the classes are somewhat confusing finding the correct skill set and play style can be hard

The games is surprisingly fun and has lots of little things to discover throughout. It can be a bit complicated at times but the community at the discord is solid with the help. There are bugs here and there, but the devs are very active in trying to make the game very enjoyable. Give it some time, the game gets more challenging and complex. Highly recommended.

descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

======Contact Us======
Follow our Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2
Join Discussion: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2/groups

descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!
developerAddress:
3 Krinou street
The Oval, Office 701
Limassol 4103
Cyprus
recentChanges: We hope you enjoy playing Sudoku. We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with Sudoku!
summary: Play classic Sudoku and train your brain for FREE!
title: Sudoku

comments: All is excellent. Great selection of cars, easy controls, strategic maps. It's all of that for a game this size, and it's great!. But I think it misses some things, which I want it to be added: 1) stickshift like control. Manual feel. 2) multiplayer. Kind of feeling a bit lonely. 3) more way to tune the car. Etc. Gear ratios, tire pressure. 4) more variation of game mode and upgrades that suit them? As of for racing mode circuit like style. Rather than all those, the game is already excellent and simply amazing.

Good day devs, I really liked your game. Free tuning for the most part was my reason for playing this game. However, I'd like to suggest to add some more tuning features, like toe tuning for tires, etc. Also, I understand the game is all about drifting, but will it be possible that you guys give some grip to the tires? It will still be possible to drift with grip anyway; the "much sliding" is not so pleasant - for me that is. Overall, I really love this game. Thank you, hopefully you think about my suggestion.  Update: also, pls add clutch pedal option. The brakes also really need some work guys. Please..

It's a very nice game but you still need to improve controls a little bit cause even though I'm now turning too much it always ended up oversteering. Also the graphics needs improvement, the smoke(actually not existing by now), the car reflection(based on what type of the paint is, like chrome,matte etc) and the textures of the environment. Another is the sounds, it doesn't sound that good(on other cars like the s15). Also the customization is not existing by now but i recommend adding it. It will make the game better. Overall, the game is good but it needs more improvement üòä Cheers Devs! Peace out!

Developers, I really would like for you to make the handling less "sharp" and more detailed. When i go around a corner, I feel like i can spin out at any time. I'd also really love for a additon of body kits and more wheels and maybe even more cars. But please, work on the controls. Its not very grippy. I also play Drift Horizon, and I've got the drifting down on that app. Thank you.   -Michael

Great game the best drifting game I have ever played... But it could do with some body kits and stuff... Also could u add more cars and tracks plz it's getting a bit boring just racing in the same cars but. Thank you üòÑüòÑüòÑ
this is just a more gay version of drift horizon and car x drift racing combined car feels super bad to drift no multiplayer. just an all round bad game and the cars sound like a lawn mower

The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
‚Ä¢ 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!‚Ä¢ Troll famous video games!‚Ä¢ 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!‚Ä¢ Unlock insane achievements!‚Ä¢ Lots of wacky collectibles!‚Ä¢ No Wi-fi needed!‚Ä¢ A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that‚Äôll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber‚Äôs go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It‚Äôs payback time for all those levels you didn‚Äôt complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?

descriptionHTML:
- # 1 - TOP - BEST - NEW -

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration - one of the best pixelated games in the first-person mode, time-tested! This game will not leave you indifferent and will present many interesting subjects and opportunities.

This game is created in the style of a sandbox with an open world, in which the player does not have any specific goals. You choose what to do in this game.

Explore the endless world of blocks and cubes. The most interesting war against zombies at night. Crafting and gathering, survival and building. And much much much more ...

Pixel Craft: Zombie Exploration provides the player with a three-dimensional generated world, entirely consisting of cubic blocks. This world you can freely rebuild, creating from the blocks of complex structures.

*** A lot of game modes of the game.

Survival mode.

description: From the producers of Racing Fever comes a brand new motor racing experience!In this game, we have blended all the adrenalin, fun and excitement a pair of tires can offer together for you. With the amazing racing experience and breathtaking graphics, you won‚Äôt be able to put your phone down.4 different camera anglesFor a more realistic experience, you may play from your racer‚Äôs viewpoint or increase your control on the race using different camera angles.Realistically modeled motorcyclesWe have modeled 16 different motorcycles down to the smallest detail for you. Take your pick, improve its performance, alter its design and start racing.A racing adventure with 4 different gang leaders and tens of levels4 different regions and 4 ruthless gang leaders! Tens of different racing types in different seasons in an amazing atmosphere await you. Defeat all 4 leaders to prove that you are the best racer!4 different control optionsWe know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!Support in 23 different languagesDon‚Äôt worry, we understand and speak the same language as you!Escape ModeIn this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your bike!Daily Bonus ModeWe didn't forget to add a mode where you can race daily to win valuable gifts!Private ModeYou get to set the time of day, weather conditions, traffic density, speed and flow and even the number of cops! You set the rules, you win the race!Please don‚Äôt forget to get in touch with us with your feedback and suggestions!
descriptionHTML:
From the producers of Racing Fever comes a brand new motor racing experience!

In this game, we have blended all the adrenalin, fun and excitement a pair of tires can offer together for you. With the amazing racing experience and breathtaking graphics, you won’t be able to put your phone down.

4 different camera angles
For a more realistic experience, you may play from your racer’s viewpoint or increase your control on the race using different camera angles.

Realistically modeled motorcycles
We have modeled 16 different motorcycles down to the smallest detail for you. Take your pick, improve its performance, alter its design and start racing.

A racing adventure with 4 different gang leaders and tens of levels
4 different regions and 4 ruthless gang leaders! Tens of different racing types in different seasons in an amazing atmosphere await you. Defeat all 4 leaders to prove that you are the best racer!

4 different control options
We know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!

Support in 23 different languages
Don’t worry, we understand and speak the same language as you!

Escape Mode
In this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your bike!

Daily Bonus Mode
We didn't forget to add a mode where you can race daily to win valuable gifts!

Private Mode
You get to set the time of day, weather conditions, traffic density, speed and flow and even the number of cops! You set the rules, you win the race!

Please don’t forget to get in touch with us with your feedback and suggestions!
developerAddress: P.O.Box 16111 RAK FTZ Ras Al Khaimah UAE
summary: A brand new motor racing experience full of fun!
title: Racing Fever: Moto

description: Its a physics puzzle game.Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
descriptionHTML:
Its a physics puzzle game.
Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity.
You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..
When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!
Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!
This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
summary: Its a nice brain-training game.
title: Puzzle Studio - Physical Line

descriptionHTML:
The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious? ♂️ ♀️

We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads! ♂️ ♀️

🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!
🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels
🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?
🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house
🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard
🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds
🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones
🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in life

Emily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽

Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
summary: Join Emily and Patrick in a hilarious battle of the sexes!
title: Delicious - Moms vs Dads

description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You‚Äôre the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids‚Äô breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom‚Äôs daily life. descriptionHTML:
This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun!
Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more!

Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don’t let your family down!

Be a SUPERMOM for your family!

Spin the bottle! During a game, the Bottle will point to a random user of the opposite sex with whom you then have a chance to kiss. Whether you kiss them or not is up to you. comments: I like this game a lot BUT the lack of gems takes the fun out of it.  I've tried a few times to get free gems by installing game's or completing a quiz but I only sometimes get the gems after. And the casino boat thing is a joke. You barely win anythingüòï I noticed nearly everyone is complaining about the same thing so I've been waiting for this to be sorted. Nothing has changed so I'll be deleting the app shortly..... What a pity!

If you love using your hard earned money for virtual play this is the game for you. What starts out with gems being a few at low amts as you advance the gem amt grows ridiculously outrageous. Move on because this game will break your bank account quickly.

It's a pretty entertaining game. BUT you have to buy EVERYTHING with gems (aka real money). Programmers focus excessively on making players pay even before they are hooked to the game!!! After getting to the second street zone, I find myself unable to continue unless I pay. I find it a little lame after all the effort you put on creating a pretty good game. Bye

Cute to see yall deleted my last review. Re writing and giving you 1 star.  Game crashes constantly. . Can no longer get into.  No more money will be spent till fixed. And if my review is removed again. I will just uninstall

Fun game at first... but be prepared to spend money if you want to get 3 stars in events! Also after you conplete the first area, they force you to spend real money to get to the next areas! Its is ridiculously gem hungry! Ive played a lot of games and tgis one takes the cake as the most gold/gem hungry game ive have ever played. The crusie ship is a scam too! Will be deleting it!

You can't proceed without gems once you unlock the second area. Pretty sad, because the game has potential. Hate to see greed override balance. You should be able to grind in a game like this and proceed... Not get stuck because you choose not to spend excessive amounts of cash.

comments: I absolutely love this game. I spend a lot of time on it! It's fairly balanced between players who play for free and those who purchase gems to give their bots better stats. You can easily rank up without paying a dime. I did for so long, until I kept hoarding pieces and didn't want to sell. I began to use gems instead of coins.

This game is have potential, don't ruined it because of money. I have never been watching so many ads In my life just to get some 2 stars parts. Instead of being creative and making cool machines, this game is turning to - either pay to win or watch alot of ads to win. What's the point of "playing" in this game?

I think this app is great! But there is a slight problem with selling items. When I repeatedly sell items, sometimes if, for example, I was selling an item for 6831 coins, then it would subtract 6831 from the total amount of coins I have and then add back in 6831 so I'd end up with just the same amount of coins I was at! Could you please fix this small bug? It would make this app even better!

Developers, please read.  First, this is a fun game and I enjoy its play style. It's reminiscent of TV shows like Battles Bots and game series' like Bot Arena.   Second, I would like to suggest giving players the ability to add, delete, and move weapon, utility, and wheel anchors. In the same way players can currently add enhancements to parts and chassis's and move around stickers.   Third, It would be appreciated if Quick Play Super Boxes replaced Regular Boxes after all shipment slots are full. It would provide a greater incentive to keep playing Quick Play beyond just Winning Streak Crown Rewards.  I'm offering these suggestions because I really enjoy this game and would like to see it become a more fulfilling and personalized experience.  Thank you,

Fun strategy game, just wish it was easier to understand upgrades and easier to get a decent vehicle. Sometimes you have to wait for boxes other times you can watch ads to get thru them with no rhyme or reason as far as I can tell. The variety or maybe the lack of variety in boxes is pretty annoying. Sometimes you get the exact same part multiple times or with slight variations, which can drag out trying to get a decent upgrade on things.

Its now just a money grab... not happy with the way this game is going, it used to be a fair rewards system, with decent quality gear, then it changed to become basic gear almost all of the time, then it became difficult to prestige since it was have good rockets and a lifter or don't win and now you actually get very little for your hard work climbing the ranks. Waiting 24 - 48 hours for a reward doesn't cut it for me.

comments: l was enjoying the game a lot and would have given it 5 stars. l spent a long time to get enough bricks to  build a level 7 home so dragons only needed 7 mins sleep.. NOW    only  the same 5 of my 30 dragons get out and this is making collecting bricks and healing power very slow. l have not seen all my green dragons and moon dragons( the hardest workers) for 2 days now. developers please help or l will stop playing. TY.

I would love to give this game 5 stars but 99% of the ground I've uncovered is covered by "treasure chests" and there's no way to get rid of them or contact the game makers for help. I've completely run out of space and can't play anymore. The chests should disappear after 3 - 5 days if they're not opened.

Love this game. Graphics are great and so much to do. Keeps me going for ages. Main concern and the reason I've not rated 5 star is the time it takes to get each token. When some levels take 7 and it takes half a day to fill up it's a major pain. Then you do a level that needs 4 and the next also 4 it takes the p*ss. Would be great to have a higher limit without getting charged or for them to fill up quicker. If this was done I would rate 5 star all round.

2/5 stars because the only way to play the game is by paying! You can either pay to remove "pay to open" boxes or they don't go away taking up all your space! It takes 1 hr for your chalices (energy) to refill only 1 and you only get 7. Love the concept of the game and it is very unique but make it so that people can actually play. Get sponsors, play some ads, have the boxes disappear after a certain amount of time, ANYYHING! This is b*lls*it and not everyone has money to throw away on games. Fix it or I keep the rating low.

Playing this game makes me lose track of time. Wish we could buy the dragon egg chests with game coins.  That would be greatly helpful. Please consider this. Also would be great to transfer items from other levels back to the camp, like eggs, flowers, etc. Plz have this feature.Thanks. Plus would help if there was a set button to hit to exit the game. I am finding it takes between a few to about 5 times to hit the back button on my tablet. Plz fix, would make things alot quicker.

Buggy.  The game itself was pretty good but there are issues with the cloud save deleting peoples games + all their in-app purchases (like me). The support for the game is non-existent. They have one email address to send issues to, and it's been weeks, almost a month, since and there has been no response. So everything is gone and they can't be bothered to try and restore my account for a month.   In short, it was fun and addictive, but your game will delete itself eventually and the support staff doesn't care since they already have your money.

comments: Graphics have glitches from time to time.  There's not a whole lot of choices to choose from other than what's being offered.  There are no way of earning diamonds to play the game other than buying them. I'd like to see more ways of earning tickets rather than buying or just waiting for it to regenerate. I'd also love to hear the characters speak.

It is addicting! I love the graphics and how everything plays out! You are always hanging on edge, biting your nails and wondering, 'Whats gonna happen next?' Over all its awesome. Sometimes there are glitches but apart from that 5/5!

This is by far one of the best choices games I think I've ever played the graphics and animation is absolutely second to non, the story so far seems awesome and intriguing. The animation is beautiful and smooth and runs well on my phone. Please never change the way this game is. It gives you the option to buy things but it is very fair to those who can't pay due to money issues so I would definitely recommend this game. The developers should be proud of this game because it really is beautiful designed and made you can tell alot of care and effort went into perfecting this game. It's worth the wait on each episode, I love the stats from other players feature and how you can go back for free to see how different choices would of effect the game differently. All round a very professionally well built game 10 out of 10 wish I could give it more stars it deserves more than 5 :D.
I find myself watching the clock for the next episodes. Great app but I wish you would change their wardrobe up. Most especially Marcia's.
If she will be with Rodrigo again, Im not playing this anymore. This drama is so boring. No matter what I do, she will always choose Rodrigo. I want her with Bruno !
keeps  me interested and so disappointed to have to wait for more tickets and gems so they get my money but gotta make a living from your talents some how

comments: I really liked the size of the island more than the way it was set up. The unclimbable mountains weren't as fun, and the animals are somewhat hard to kill. But they make up for it when they don't spontaneously attack you out of nowhere lol

I love this game and want to give it a 5, but it started crashing every time I try to mod my house and that takes a lot of the fun out for me. If I try to add anything or move something it turns into a black screen and crashes. Everything else works fine though and overall I do greatly enjoy it.

Just downloaded the game. The controller is weird, the character will turn 360¬∞ before going to the direction i want. lol. No tutorial, the crafting is confusing, animal like dodo is hard to kill ( make it easier please for new player ). And maybe the developer could add more meat in inventory after we kill the animal? i dont know if its different on each animal because i only got to kill dodo just for 1 meat. and also is there any option to connect the game with fb or google?

Today's update broke the game it refuses to connect to the internet both my carrier and my home wifi work fine on all other apps so I know it is not a signal or network problem once this is fixed my rating will go back up to 5 stars
So what the hell am I meant to do. No instructions, surrounded by dinos  walking around with nothing to do. Pointless.
It keeps saying no internet connection but I'm connected to the internet.

descriptionHTML:
How did you get to this island?? What If it's your last day? It's worse than the apocalypse… Because this isn't just a desert island. You are not alone here... The Island is inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs!!! The Fight for survival has begun...

If you like survival games, The Ark of Craft 2: Jurassic Survival Island is all you need! This is the best survival simulator you’ve ever seen! Survival, craft and hunt are waiting for you on the island. Play free without internet. Open world is here!

Survival Island features:

💎 Mysterious caves: find a dino cave and collect rare resources
Explore ancient caves full of dangerous dinosaurs and rare resources. Discover new species of dinosaurs! Collect rare resources, craft tools and weapons, build your own house in the open world!

🌴New great 3D graphics
Enjoy the newest version of high resolution graphics in 3D. Survival feels more real than ever. Just imagine suddenly finding an island with giant jungle forest and ancient animals. Survival simulator with the best 3D graphics is already here!

Apocalypse or desert island... anyway, you have to survive. You can craft weapons: axe, bow and arrows. They will help you to hunt for food and protect yourself in the fight. Enjoy survival craft! Be a real dino hunter!

descriptionHTML:
Rocket to the finish line in Turbo FAST, the top mobile racing game!

Challenge your friends for slick shell upgrades and delicious tomato prize pools!

Head down to the Garage where Tito will show you the ropes and help you trick-out your own sweet ride!

Race, drift, slide and jump your way to the top of the Leaderboards!

• 13 unique race tracks to test your skills
• Challenge Mode: go head to head against your friends to win delicious tomatoes!

Visit teamturbofast.com for extra features and to view the hit series Turbo FAST on Netflix!

comments: OMG ITS FINALLY OUT! I've been waiting for this to come out for like literally 4 years! Anyway so far I honestly liked the equipment system in the original version better than this one.. I don't like the whole idea of unlocking equipment you got, that just doesn't even make a lot of sense.. Plus there is an equipment list that kinda shows you what everything looks like right now so thats a bit of a spoiler for me for obtaining new gear.. Other than that, the gameplay is great! You get all 4 characters much more immediately and I do like that. 4 stars at this point but I can see myself coming back and bumping it up to 5!

No touch response. I downloaded the patch, watched the intro, connect to google play account, input name (no illegal characters) and the button to create does not light up or respond to touch. LG G5 Canadian. Will rate better when this is fixed. As the game was just released I understand there may be bugs that need squashing. Good luck!

Pre-registered for this game and it didn't disappoint. Graphics are smooth, characters are great with fluid combat system. My only bad point with it is that after a few days of playing I went to open up the game and it won't load, I get as far as the n way screen then black screen?? Please fix Devs, anxious to delve back into it.

So far so good.. pretty smooth but i guess the graphic got downgraded because i remember this game had better graphic quaLity before.. maybe add graphic quaLity option? aLso the targeting system is a bit too hard.. maybe add an option to assist targeting because it's hard to aim i kept getting missed hits.. overaLL its decent.. keep it up!

The game runs decent although you do need wifi or a very good connection for arena. Everything is very limited due to the awful energy/stamina system which will obviously be a huge downfall. It gets repetitive fairly quick and is limited on what you can actually do. Looks like it will be heavily P2W with all the store sales and again, running out of energy quickly. It's a good game for an hour here or there but for a game that you need to farm items for equipment the energy limit really ruins it. I'll be looking elsewhere for a similar game without the energy/stamina limitations

Little disappointed in the way too long forced tutorial. After stage 1-5 I decided I didn't have time to see when the tutorial would finish. I'll try again later but so far it's a fairly simple, but quality SS fighter. Which is why the tutorial seems excessive. Game just is not that complicated.

comments: It probably doesnt mean much after all my complaining but this really is so much better now. 5 pvp bars to fill based on damage dealt to opponent. You dont even have to win anymore! You can now still boost your deck even if you cant afford to pay too much (I pay for cheaper offers whenever i can). Thanks so much for listening to everyone and making this game great! Keep it up guys! Nice job!

Fun game! Update is great. It's easier to grind towards those PvP cards when you can still make some progress even when losing a match.  Those who say it's now 5 wins for a pack haven't played the update. It's 5 phones destroyed , or 5 life bars taken. So if you lose a sudden death match where you've taken 2 of your opponent's life bars, you still get 2 'wins' towards a PvP reward. You can lose 3 times and get the cards. You don't have to win 3 which can be hard with all the cheaters you encounter.

I want to give this five stars as I really enjoy the gameplay and I'm practically addicted to it. The update has made PvP overall more fun for me as there is less pressure to win, so everyone still gets something out of it whether they win or lose, which I'm happy for. However demanding so much storage space on my phone makes it unplayable even after deleting most of my other apps, music, and photos. I really want to keep playing and this seems to be an issue with other users too. I hope this gets fixed soon

Still enjoying overall, always nice to go on down to South Park.

descriptionHTML:
The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!
