description: Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games- elegant dresses and accessories- easy to play, like all our makeup gamesWe hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how  we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !
descriptionHTML:
Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.

Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.

First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.

The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.

After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.

Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :

- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments
- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games
- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure
- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games
- elegant dresses and accessories
- easy to play, like all our makeup games

We hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !
summary: Princess Makeup and Nail Salon is one of our collection of princess makeup games
title: Princess Makeup and Nail Salon

Stuntman Water Run is the best action adventure game with the awesome stuntman and amazing physics. Don’t be afraid of open waters and accept the master challenges of water wipers, wrecking balls and bouncing punches in high-speed running game!

description: The fate of the block world rests in the hands of a small but elite band of rebels in The Survival Hungry Games 2. As their leader, you have called the shots and mapped out the plans that will crush the government officials who have turned the human race into a cruel sport for the entertainment of the privileged. It's time to rise from the ashes of the war torn nations and defend the blocky race against these sadists. It's time to survive.Progress through your mission and mow down enemies and blow away groups of foes as you battle unique enemies with their own set of challenges. As you rise to the threat, the figurehead of the district has sent mass mobs of clan enemies to smother your efforts. Take control, tactic and quick thinking is everything when dealing with this enemy. Deal damage in your quest and enjoy smooth, intuitive controls in this survival game. It's do or die...

Many crime families and terrorist mafia have sped up their gang war activities to destroy your beloved city. Your city has become a deadly town and real gangster crime battlezone. People are waiting for any city avenger hero and real fighting warrior to fight against crime and terror with his special powers. Make your city secure with superpower abilities like laser attack, hand blades, ground stomp and lightning and become city fighter. Grand street mafia has split up intro groups of terrorists, human traffickers and robbers and they are planning for some big threats like insolence, deportation, murder and revenge, treat them with kicks, punches and special tricks of dark panther superhero. End your search of superhero fighting games, gangster games 2018 and free fighting games, just download brand new panther hero vs super villains game and start your superhero gangster battle now.Fight to survive in Vegas crime city by playing Panther Superhero Rescue Mission Crime City Battle. Join superheroes league and superhero fighting squad to learn incredible crime fighting skills for emergency rescue missions in vice town. Only immortal superheroes can now defend this beautiful city from grand underworld. Super panther flying hero is the only hope for the people of New York. comments: Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actually online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Nice game ...the only problem  I say would be its pay to win philosophy. Yeah it's easy in the beginning but the gear gets really scarce to if your really trying to win it'll be next to impossible to do so with out swiping that good 'ol debit card. Otherwise it's a fun and awesome game. That is in the beginning....

Good concept. Good game. Many glitches. For a game that's touted for and based on pvp it makes no sense that %80 of the time the game freezes going into a pvp battle. It's okay though, you can close it and then immediately reopen it to a message that tells you that you died. Fix your freezing problems and I'd give you 4 stars.

Really solid graphics and game play for mobile. Doesn't want to work with my Bluetooth controller. As a free game they have really doubled down on the shards and multiple currencies to try to get you to spend. You really need to grind if you want to unlock anything without paying.

comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. And add newer cars and guns it's fun but and the same time it's boring plz do these.!!!!!!!!!!!

Pretty good game, though there should be a higher emphasis on fighting. We should be able to register accounts, and receive money for our kills. Also, when we kill someone, it should say in chat who we killed. Game has great potential, registering accounts would be nice to so that we can make friends and remember people. :D

I love the game, it is a great time killer, but I have suggestions. First you should add more guns, like pistols, and add grenades. Also have the plane controls more easier to use, I always have difficulty with that. Add more maps, more planes to fly. Make it so it can save the cars or planes you get. I always lose money buying the same car again every time I log back in the game. Other than that, I love the game!

Please add new cars and other ways to earn money. Customizable characters would be better so people can have unique avatars. Most importantly, please add a variety of maps to choose from and different game modes. ( boring )

Hope you will take quick action in this manner Thanks.. Apoorv

And I was about to uninstall it..     2_one of the question was you can play with other users offline. This is not correct!...     3_ need to add "Edit and changing names"     4_Game rated with 5 star.. Than you all üé±

I realize y'all gotta get paid but why make the playing experience for those of us that don't pay cash money.  Not allowing a player to select a pocket when shooting the 8 ball and allowing your opponent to shoot and win. I guess I'm pretty good because nobody has been able to get rid of me playing pool. Instead I seem to get strange lock ups or no response from game. I always seem to lose 100s of thousands. It's a pretty good app and I've sent many people to download your app.

Best pool graphic wise but the game is not fair what so ever. Game is Controlled you don't decide if you win the game does. Your win percentage and rank don't mean squat. Cues length and force controlled to games advantage even when reloaded. I had 6,991,000 and my win percentage was 61.3 and lost 1 million 5x in a row. How do I have a 61.3% chance of winning and lose so easily by these 40-50% players like nothing. If you don't actually buy stuff with actual money on app game will treat you poorly.

comments: I rather enjoy the game a lot. It feels balanced for the most part,  leveling takes a while which wouldn't be a issue if it didn't take so long to go place to place. Gets sort of annoying to go back and forth trying to get resources and the game goes from fun to grindy quickly.   My main issue is the battery life of my phone. While charging my phone and playing this game but battery was being drained.  Graphics are good, I enjoy the crafting and base building, the combat is nice, and the auto harvest feature is a life saver.

**UPDATE** Is an awesome game. Could use a few more perks (ie. Weapons and hard to get items) in drop boxes and yellow zones.Now the down side is if you die in a level your last position is no longer there to try and recoup some of your items. Players killing you as you open trunks in inventory. Oh ya and the free spin box...give random prizes instead of coins and rope. People will get really into it if perks are awesome. Great game could be the best with a couple tweaks. Awesome job.

Just another game that either makes you wait to play it, or pay not to wait. Why? Don't make me pay not to wait. Entice me to pay with cool things, otherwise it's an instant uninstall. Poor business model. Imagine paying double to get them to make your food faster at a restaurant, or just wait a long time. Would you really keep going there, or somewhere else that makes something just as good but in a reasonable amount of time?

Anyway i edit this review... The is nice and graphics are cool. But there is the problem on the game. Could you pls remove the energy bar so i can still play the without waiting to fill the energy bar... Cause otherwise i less play this game in days... that you know you must wait your energy bar to fill again in a couple of minutes if the energy is gone?. Pls Remove it so we can play all day along.. Thank you.

This game truly amazing with beautiful graphics, decent yet easy controls, a large amunt of items and okay customization. The only reason i give this a 4 star rating is because one thing. The hoard mechanic. I mean it's a good concept. The only problem is that there's a hoard every 24 hours. And since wood is kinda pain to get it sucks to come back after work to come to a destroyed house. If it was like every month or heck even every week that would be fine just please give more time than 24 hours for a hoard

Not happy at the moment after the latest updates... No point of spending any cash seeing that you went from getting a loot box to only getting one item at a time... Some parts are still impossible to come by even clearing the infected forest. Hope the next update will be more worthwhile. Apart from that still a good game. Keep it up

descriptionHTML:
Over 300,000 people love playing Mahjong Quest! We hope you will feel the same!

Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hiddenmahjong/

Enjoy A relaxing mahjong game
Our standard and expert levels are designed in ways that guarantee they will always be solvable. Hints are always available if you need a helping hand.

Collect and craft treasures
When you match crafting component tiles, you will collect the items. At the end of each level, you can open 1-3 to treasure chests to get even more materials. Combine the crafting items into a treasure which you can sell for 100,000s of gold coins!

Our Mahjong Game Features
-Easy to play mahjong mechanic and hint system
-520 levels (260 normal and 260 expert)
-260 beautiful pieces of artwork which can be downloaded
-1040 Bonus levels
-Rescues and upgrade a cute companion creature!
-Daily rewards
-Every level uses different tile sets
-Replay for high scores
-Earn coins and unlock more boards
-Become the mahjong master

Dungeon Level
Every land has a dark boss dungeon level to complete! It's dark in the dungeon but you will earn HUGE coins for completing it!

1040 Bonus Levels
Open the Blue spheres for 260 Bonus levels with tricky emoji tile faces!
Open the Red spheres for 260 Bonus Expert levels with emoji tile faces!
Open the Green spheres for 260 Bonus levels where you match 3 tiles at a time!
Open the Yellow spheres for 260 Bonus Expert levels where you match 4 tiles at a time!
*Every time you unlock a normal or expert level you get 2 of these bonus levels to play for free!

Rescue and upgrade Lumin!
Lumin has been trapped in the Mansion. Once freed his power will help you earn more coins. Lumin can be leveled up 4 times! And more in future updates! :)

Star Bonus System
Every star collected gives bonuses! Get progressively larger rewards from your globe, daily reward, wheel spins, map treasures and crafted items!

No wifi or internet access needed to play
Enjoy your Mahjong Quests everywhere you go without needing an internet connection.

Your Mahjong Journey Across 14+ Maps
*We add 2 new maps every month!

Mystery Mansion
Levels 1-20 Begin your quest revealing creepy haunted houses and mystery mansions!

Halloween House
Levels 21-40 It's that spooky time of year again, check out what's happening at the Halloween House!

Monster Mash
Levels 41-60 A collection of images of various monsters like trolls, nightwalkers and other creatures of all persuasion.

Grim Tales
Levels 61-80 Relive classic Halloween stories and beautiful created artworks!

Hallows Eve
Levels 81-100 Celebrate Halloween by wearing your best costumes such as witches and wizards, and go trick or treat!

Twilight Fantasy
Levels 101-120 Move into the realm of vampires! What are these ancient creatures up to in the mansion?

Pumpkin Patch
Levels 121-140 Advance to the world of Jack o-Lanterns with different types of pumpkin carvings!

Halloween Time
Levels 141-160 Continue your adventure and explore more spooky scenes but look out for spine-chilling realms and monsters!

Happy Haunts 1
Levels 161-180 Take in the haunting sceneries and bravely enjoy the beautiful yet creepy artworks!

Happy Haunts 2
Levels 181-200 A sequel to give you more haunting experience, more goose-bumps down to your spine!

Trick or Treat
Levels 201-220 Now it's the time for Halloween costume for kids! Make a choice... trick or a treat?!

Scared Sweet
Levels 221-240 It's time to be scared sweet and observe all different Halloween things!

Mystic Moonlight
Levels 241-260 Look at the beautiful scenes illuminated by the light of the moon!

Spooky Travels
Levels 261-280 travel through spooky haunted Halloween locations!

And many more, rapidly approaching 400 levels!>/b>

Follow us on Facebook for the latest news and updates!
https://www.facebook.com/hiddenmahjong/

descriptionHTML:
You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. In prison that sort's a sprawling labyrinth of gangsters, murders, lowlifes, drug dealers and thieves you have to find way out, and maybe then you'll get a chance to prove your innocence. With no friends among his fellow inmates, you must rely only on yourself.

Solve the puzzles, discover the hidden objects, manipulate the prisoners and guards, use your skills, do whatever it takes, and become an inmate who destined to escape..

↗ An addictive prison escape game!
↗ Solve the puzzles and use your skills to escape!
↗ Manipulate the prisoners and guards!
↗ Gorgeous graphics and different themed rooms!
↗ Addicting mini puzzles!

comments: The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

descriptionHTML:
Neither fate nor lineage can make a hero -- you must grab your sword and become one yourself!

Forge your epic destiny in Iron Blade -- the most thrilling of all action RPG games -- set in a medieval Europe filled with war, discord and magic. Explore a fantasy game world brought to life with console-quality graphics and an innovative -- yet easy to learn -- combat system that is never idle and always throws you into one heart-pounding fight after another!

Collect amazing weapons for your monster hunter, explore breathtaking real-world locations and dungeon strongholds to test your skills against millions of other players as your build your own kingdom and engage in exciting PvP challenges.

**GAME FEATURES**

AN EPIC ODYSSEY
- A demonic army of war approaches, and no castle is safe from their discord and bloodlust. This is no time to be idle! Raise your sword, become a monster hunter and fulfill the prophecy to seal them away for good!
- Unravel a plot of intrigue and betrayal as you fight through this RPG game's challenging story missions.
- Explore a game world rich in lore and set in an alternate-reality fantasy Europe, full of epic warriors, discord and arcane mysteries.
- Your RPG adventure games will take you through many awe-inspiring locations beyond any other RPG games, from a fight with Demon Knights in Notre Dame to putting vampires to the sword in a Transylvanian dungeon.

A LINEAGE OF WAR
- Everyone can enjoy the deep dungeon-crawling RPG action thanks to controls that were specially designed for a mobile game, which allow you to smoothly perform amazing chains of sword attacks in the heat of war.
- Develop your fantasy fight style by linking up taps and swipes in the game to perform monster-hunter combos.
- Face a fearsome variety of epic dungeon foes, each rendered from beautiful art, and brought to life with amazing game graphics, action and combat abilities.
- Unleash deadly special-action attacks and finishing sword-moves that deliver a grizzly end to any who dare to battle against you in war.

THE KING OF RPG GAMES
- Fight with fantasy weapons and war armor that you can collect in your RPG adventure games.
- Upgrade your monster-hunter gear to customize your fighting strengths and war style.
- Unleash devastating spells and high-action skills on your in-game foes.

COMPETE WITH PLAYERS
- Establish your own epic fantasy RPG kingdom that you can fortify with a Castle.
- Acquire and upgrade Castle Defenders of the finest lineage to fight off invaders and protect its resources from discord while you're idle or away from the game.
- Take action and wage war on other players' Castle strongholds to crush their defenses and loot their most valuable resources for yourself!


For fans of RPG games, action, discord, sword-swinging role-playing games, fantasy, monster-hunter knight games, building a castle, defending the lineage of a king, and RPG games that never have an idle moment.

description: Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy‚Äôs Adventure. Diggy's Adventure Features:- #1 Rated Adventure Game- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from- 100+ Funny characters to interact with- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures- Regular weekly updates full of fun events- 18 languages to play in- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skillsJoin the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.No secret may remain hidden!Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis. Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewardsGain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.Note: A network connection is required to playNote: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!
descriptionHTML:
Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy’s Adventure.

Diggy's Adventure Features:
- #1 Rated Adventure Game
- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve
- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from
- 100+ Funny characters to interact with
- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures
- Regular weekly updates full of fun events
- 18 languages to play in
- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skills

Join the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.

No secret may remain hidden!
Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis.

Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.

Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewards
Gain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.

Note: A network connection is required to play
Note: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.

Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!
Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!
summary: Explore world's biggest mysteries in our addictive puzzle solving game!
title: Diggy's Adventure

However, if you look closely the game changes the options on the wheel if you come close to getting one of the better options. descriptionHTML:
#BRINGONTHEMAYHEM

WWE Mayhem is bigger & bolder than the rest, with fast-paced mobile arcade action and over-the-top moves!

Play as John Cena, The Rock, Brock Lesnar and ALL your favorite WWE Legends and Superstars in this high-flying, in ring, arcade action game. Take your WWE Superstars to the next level in weekly WWE RAW and SmackDown Live challenges!

Play through epic matches between WWE Legends and WWE Superstars to determine the greatest of all time, each with their own Signature Moves and Super Specials.

SPECTACULAR ROSTER
Choose from an ever-growing roster of WWE Superstars and WWE Legends, including: John Cena, The Rock, Andre the Giant, Triple H, Xavier Woods, AJ Styles, Stone Cold Steve Austin, Brock Lesnar, Roman Reigns, Undertaker, Randy Orton, Seth Rollins, Jinder Mahal, Kalisto, Big E and many more.

Each WWE Legend and WWE Superstar boasts a distinctive and highly stylized look, adding to the overall spectacle and atmosphere.

6 DISTINCTIVE SUPERSTARS CLASSES:
Elevate the WWE Action with 6 distinctive character classes. Create a supreme WWE Superstar squad from BRAWLER, HIGH FLYER, POWERHOUSE, TECHNICIAN, WILDCARD & SHOWMAN. Each class comes with unique strengths and fighting advantages.

TAG TEAM AND WEEKLY EVENTS:
Build your roster of mighty WWE Superstars and join forces with other champions in TAG-TEAM match-ups. Play action-packed EVENTS in sync with real world WWE Live shows like Monday Night RAW, SmackDown Live, Clash of Champions PPV, and monthly Title events.

NEVER BEFORE SEEN REVERSALS:
Time your reversal perfectly to turn a loss into win! Build your special attack meter throughout the clash and utilize it as a brutal special move or REVERSAL. Be careful though – your reversals can be reversed!

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS IN EVENTS AND VERSUS MODE:
Build your defense with your favorite WWE Superstars and Challenge your friends in Versus Mode. Take your experience to the next level by adding additional WWE Legends and Superstars to your team.

REWARDS & BOUNTIES:
Aim for the ultimate prize – The WWE Championship Title, to gain precious Bonus Rewards with each win. Open your Lootcases to unlock new Character Classes, Gold, Boosts, special prizes, and even high-level WWE Superstars!

WWE Mayhem delivers all the adrenaline, thrill, and excitement of a Live WWE Match!

Experience the raw emotion of WWE Action Now – DOWNLOAD WWE MAYHEM!

This game is completely free to download and play. However, some items can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store’s settings.

*Also optimized for tablet devices

description: HERO WARS the return of the original defense game!In 2020, Mutants and aliens invaded the Earth.All cities are destroyed. They destroy crops, buildings, bridges and roads. comments: Amazing game if you like naval warships. UPDATE: As of Feb 17 2018, the new update has seriously increased the game content and fun level. UPDATE as of Feb 27 2018, Lowered my rating to 4 stars because there is a constant issue with the timers or something like that.  I login and collect the crate and start a module upgrading then login several hours late and is like no time elapsed in the game from the last time I logged in. This has happened several times in the past as well.

Best battleship game on Android hands down ! Better than wargaming ship game great controls great graphics !Fun to play good selection of warships and large maps and they keep on doing updates to keep it interesting! And the most important thing is the price of ships are fair keep up the great work . I love the last update with graphics and maps and ships. the only thing the Bismarck is under powered can you make her stronger because she was the pride of Germany and everybody complains she is not a good ship.She is a powerhouse thank you!

Definitely a good game and worth your time and money. Only issue that developers really need to attend to is how they select the team. You can't have 7 ships of high ranks against 5 or 4 ships of low rank. It makes a person want to delete the game even after spending money on it. Keep same ranked players together in a battle. Really irritating.

Fact need a good connection to keep control of your ships Now, I have plenty of $$$ nothing to spend on it. Waiting to get the last max destroyer ship i can get on the random container spin.  Also noted... I open up the app the next day and the container count down says 2+ hours. It should read 0 zero I would think.

This is a fantastic game one of the best by miles. I am not sure however, that the latest update was such a success. Prior to update the smaller torpedo boats had a good chance now that dynamic has been removed by the dominance of the larger ships firepower and slow reload times on torpedoes.  This means that the strategic component has been somewhat diminished

look since the update the game constantly resarts when trying to enter battle.....  now I just had my tablet lock up for a half hour....  the chat in this game has killed it.... constantly getting the game  restarted..... booting back to desktop. I have been playing for over a year with iowa and new Jersey completely maxed...  its sad to see the quality go down

comments: I used to love this game hence  I moved to the English server... having played on the Chinese server, I noticed the drop rate for this server is super low. Also the packages in the game ate way overpriced. Some skins in the Chinese server are free (ie moonlight blossom yuki onna) whereas in NA server you have to pay to get it. Honestly if the playing field is equal between the NA and the Asia server were equal, I'll stay in the NA server. Right now I'm going to move back to the Asia server even tho I can barely read the story.

I love absolutely everything about this game. Its perfect...accept for one very big detail. Sadly, the characters that have unique and strategic skills are amazingly fun but will never amount to anything in pvp. The good characters are all too easy to play with and it becomes dull due to the lack of thought it takes to win. PVP is a disaster in gameplay and matchmaking. Otherwise, this game is very good.

I loved the game when I played the beta. Turn based rpg with different parables within the story mode. Unique unit designs. I cant get very far with the game because the audio echoes itself to the point where its almost hard to understand what is happening. Its a good thing there is subtitles. The game prides itself on its audio aspect by recommending "use earphones for best experience" before starting, and I would really love to hear the game.

It's a beautifully made game with a good story line involved. Sure it can be pay to win and all that, but nothing that a bit of hard work can't catch up to.  The controls are easy enough to understand and the combat system is just as simple. It does offer a few unique things such as the shared resource for bigger and better attacks, but it only adds to the depth of the combat system. All in all it's a good game and well thought out.

After playing for awhile, I just noticed the attention to detail (eg. characters look at others when a move is made, particles effect etc) is superb. Can't comment on the gameplay as for now, but the layout and the flow of the game is awesome. Definitely a game to try out!

We need more event and rewards so f2p player will stick into this game.  Almost no resources after playing more than 14 days. Only open this app for around 30 min a day and run out of energy.  Might as well getting bored soon :/

description: Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress. Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.Try to top the leaderboard.Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
descriptionHTML:
Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress.
Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.
Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.
The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.

Try to top the leaderboard.

Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!

comments: I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

This game is an amazing way to pass the time! I love all the upgrades and different levels, especially the events. The game gets more challenging as you go along, and the events I previoisly mentioned make it just that much better. My only complaint is how hard it is to get the special currency of the game, being diamonds. Other than that, it is a great game overall and I am looking forward to future updates.

Love this game. Easy to play. My daughter and her partner both downloaded after playing mine.  When I first downloaded the game I didn't need to have the internet on. Don't know what happened but I know have to be on the internet to start the game but can then turn the internet off. Otherwise happy with it. So many restaurants to buy. And you can get ahead with the casino and keep playing everyday to get more money and gems. Thumbs up from me.

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.

I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers‚Äô experience more personal and memorable ‚Äì just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don‚Äôt forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location ‚Äì to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage ‚Äì to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

comments: With due respect. I believe the game is a gem to all and no game in it's level could compare to its ease of playability. My only concern is the lack of sniper and demolition characters. There is so many Assault characters that I wouldn't mind if you turned Skull into a sniper

I think the shooting range should be mechinary the bullet shouldn't be reloaded . It should be going as many as it can. Nice game. Really I don't play games but for cover fire am in love with it. And please there should be no end of it because am playing it. Till I lost my phone. üòÇ

This is very nice game, but problem is all time it's will show the upgrade the card's.. So do some change.. game and graphic are really good.. but card updation is boring, I will give one opinion please change the updation of card's system....... And energy need to play its taken so much time.. So we are not playing these game for long..... Please change some of these problem.... Except the card updation system and energy systems... All good and I've completed all ur levels in 10days. Now I'm awaiting for ur new levels and one more which I'm surprised is that.. I'm expecting some stories to end it. I've understood so far that there are other side people who are building some thing and they r trying to stop us but I have not understood why these 2 group are fighting and who is the leader in my group and theirs too. U need to make some more realistic stories so that we can take it part of action movie.. Thanks otherwise

This is my most honest review..Never have I ever played a game truly this fantastic where you literally don't have to spend real money if you could wait 4 hrs for every chest. Gameplay is amazing and then there are events which make the experience even more enthralling. Give this piece a go.

Great graphics, good storyline, campaign mode is challenging. It would be better if more scenarios could be added for skirmishes. Overall enjoyed it. I will recommend even for those who don't wish to spend money on games.
description: Lead your brigade of heroes to a war against Tetracorp corporation in the best shooting game. Build your frontline strategy in the battlefield and kill your enemy from all sides. Face limitless ops action in the online tournaments game mode.Take your weapons from a killing arsenal and level up your soldiers with unique shooter skills. Do you accept the challenge? Take your weapon, strike the enemy army with a hail of bullet, grenades, massive guns. Release the Fury of this War! - Modern CONTROL that bring you an UNIQUE and immersive FEELING. Connect your finger to the trigger. PRESS and SHOOT! - HD Graphics with DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENTS, detailed scenes full of particles and grapeshot.. Everything interacts with you and your soldiers.  - Become a real veteran soldier in the ONLINE TOURNAMENTS MODE, put yourself in a frenetic and dynamic adventure with NON STOP ACTION against other assassins players. Don‚Äôt stop shooting with the best commando and sniper mission game. - Supply yourself with a HUGE REAL ARSENAL. You have never seen so realistic guns in shooter games: pistols, shotguns, rifles, snipers, grenades‚Ä¶ feel like a real frontline commando! - Face the battlefield from different perspectives. TETRACORP is occupying several areas over the planet suppressing the villages, taking over their resources, and controlling every single communication. A new resistance has born and it‚Äôs time to eradicate this menace. Set your brigade of mercenaries and start the journey to battle, prelude of the biggest war the Earth has ever seen. The discovery of a new material, the element 115, it can decide the fate of the mankind and it can not fall in the hands of Tetracorp. In Cover Fire you will be the hero who lead a squad of veterans through sieged cities, deserts and fields taken by guerrillas, and defeat all kind of enemies in the war game with the biggest graphic, greatest arsenal and the best gameplay on the store. comments: Found Yu-Gi-Oh on Netflix last week and decided to rewatch it. A few episodes in, and my love for the show rekindled, I got eager to play the game myself. I used to play with Yu-Go-Oh cards when I was a kid but it's been about 12 years since then and so all my old cards are in the loft, not that I know anyone IRL anymore who would fancy a game anyway, and not accessible right now... plus I had forgotten most of the rules too. But this app is just what I was looking for: a way to relearn the rules and have a bit of fun. Perfect for whatever skill level you're at with the game!

this truly an amazing game, there's really only a couple of things, why reduce the monster and spell/trap zones to only 3 cards? I wouldn't say it's bad, I just don't see why you'd need to do it.. plus the average deck size of yugioh is between 40 and 50 cards, why limit us to only a max of 30 cards? (not including the 5 for extra  decks) but all in all its a great game! Finally got my six samurai deck!üòÑ also, I think it'd be an awesome idea to put in a way for duelists to redeem the codes on the cards they've purchased IRL. I bet that'd get even more duelists to play! Just a thought thoughüòä

Never played Yugioh this is the first time in this game and it is easily accessible with this game to get into this card game. I liked Yugioh better than the other TCG game like Pok√©mon,Hearthstone,Magic etc and I thought they are kind of more complicated for me because of their sourcing system like mana and energy while its all about monster cards, traps and spells etc. Very good card game and newbie friendly in general both those wanting to get into Yugioh and card gaming in general :D

Just sad if only they could fix the  zone to 5 monsters spell and trap cards. Plus the starting with 5 cards and the original deck size and life points to 8000 it would be soo good. Hope you do that and fix it im sure more ppl would  play this if you do

Trash, true fans would never say this game is great. Only 3 monster and spell/trap zones and the person that goes first only starts with 4 cards? Really? Not to mention the terrible camera angles and rigged matches. If you're a competitive player that doesn't like to get bs, don't play this.

My app is not opening. I love this game wish you have have out more different cards in the packs. I would like to see swords of reveling light. A bunch of rare magic and trap cards. You should not be able to use Odion's chain reaction duel sense in the PvP duels.

Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience![FEATURES]Fighting Card Games- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missionsOnline Multiplayer Battles- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai! - Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!Card Battle Deck- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!- Shop for cards in the game store!Stay tuned for future card additions![ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.[Supported OS]Android 4.4 and above
descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above
summary: Card games with epic monsters! Fight other Duelists in online PVP battles!
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links

comments: Great game! Simplistic in the greatest form from graphics to game play. Would be 5 stars but -1 for placement of bottom ad I mean so easy to accidentally hit. Well placed I'm sure....With recent update I think you get random ad runs too. Game 5+ stars. 4 because of ads..

Smooth control. Awesome idea . Not Much more I can say about it.(First Review). Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars
Ads pop up during gameplay where your fingers contact so it stops game play ... other than that it's good but I've had enough. Fk you chilly:-p uninstalling

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

The spit is on! Defeat hipster enemies as you collect coins, power-ups and crazy llama costumes. Lllama-tastic scores can land you on the leaderboard, so what are you waiting for? Get spitting!

• Play a REAL game from Season 2 of Nickelodeon's hit show: GAME SHAKERS!

comments: Ah perfect game. Fast pace not laggy smooth graphics, and playable on any devices. But i hope i can change my region like asian.. Bcoz most of the player i encounter is mexecan or spanish.. 1 more thing i hope you add a larger map i guess for team battle i think 4km x 4km is enough.. And 30mins of total playing time.. All in all fantastic game.. A two thumbs up for you guys. Keep it up

There is nothing as satisfying as sniping a person a kilometre away with a modified SCAR with a 4X scope, except for winning the match. There is a single problem though. SMG bullets do absolutely no damage with no attached scope, up to a certain distance when I put the aim mode on. Could you change that and make the damage at least 5? Other than that this game is absolutely amazing.

The best survivor royale esque game you can find on the play store. Takes up immensely less space than others like Rules of Survival. Anyone can play this, no matter the quality of their phone. It's intense solo, duo, and squad gameplay will always have you coming back to take a shot (no pun intended) at another win. An amazing feature is it's voice chat communication system. You can talk to your teammates (though unfortunately, I find most players speak Spanish. You may have more luck.) though i wish there was a text chat as well. It will hopefully come in the next update, bur I would definitely recommend getting this game. My only other suggestion is new maps, a night mode, more weapons, and attachments.

I could have given five stars. The only problem is the number of players per drop/game. Please change it to 80 to 100 range. Pretty sure youll have a lot of players and ill be glad to recommend it in my facebook page if youll be able to increase the max players. It tends to become boring when you see only 12 players left when the safe zone did not even appear yet. You will look like a rat looking for a cheese around the map. More players means more fun. If you'll take this suggestion seriously, you will thank me later.

It's a pretty solid effort at a battle royale genre it need more customization however maybe another map and just a tad smoother on the game mechanics. Also if it could hit the 100 player per match marker that would be great but I understand that the map must be smaller so it might get a little too crowded.

I love this game so much, but what about more structures? Also I wish there was a chat in game that you can just type instead of voice chat, also the number one thing I wish you guys could add in or fix is the snipers bc they are weak... also I think there should be a counter somewhere when people dismount the plane so we can Dee how much are still in plane and how much already left  That's all
description: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.[Form guilds]Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds![Battlegrounds in its original form]Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.[Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.[Contact us]Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN
descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.

[Contact us]
Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN

Lie Detector Test Free is a funny game which simulates to detect whether you tell the truth or lie. You just need to press your finger on the fingerprint scanner and then the Lie detector app will scan your finger and calculates the result, true or false.

You can preset answers (truth or lie) in the settings screen and ask them questions.

Record their voice while they answer the question. The application will act like analyzing their voice and display the preset answer from settings. Of course it is a simulated app used to prank your friends.

It allows you to preset the result in a secret way. It is so interesting.

Be nice if you could do more area and less puzzle.

I love decorating the rooms but I am having to pay too much to get enough points to do it.   I also don't like that each room requires more points to do the tasks than the previous room.  I have changed my rating to low because you end up spending too much of your own money to get powerful to get your stars to complete the tasks.  They also lose your purchases.  I bought a desk chair yesterday and now it is missing and the task is gone too.  Rip off.

This game is awesome. But the stars, please increase the amount of star not just 1. Make it 2 for the Hard Level. And lastly, it's hard to download new rooms when it always appear the Technical Error. Better if you do not require to download it and the user can open it without connecting to internet. However, the game is great for relaxing. Keep up the good work!

Never thought it would be this addictive! At first i thought "Oh, its THAT game that always pops up in advertisements." but after deciding to give it a try, i am hooked!   I introduced homescapes to my mom as well and downloaded it for her and she finds it adorable and fun as well. We both take time to chill out and have fun with the puzzles occasionally when we are together.   I cant find a single flaw or critique for this game, its amazing :)

Veeery enjoyable game! I feel like it's advertised too much, but it's definitely worth playing. Especially if you love games like Bejeweled!  Some of the levels are unnecessarily difficult to get by. You have to either get lucky, or be some type of strategic genius to pass them within a good time frame. That's slightly disappounting. Its too much of an encouragement to use money.

Homescapes is an awesome game, combining the relaxation (and frustration!) of match 3 games with the joy of renovating a fabulous mansion. Throw in the fascinating story line, lovable characters lovely music and stunning graphics (except the kitchen wallpaper lol), I'll be playing this for a long time! I'm working on the living room right now, getting close to level 600. Can't wait to see what the new character, Jerry, has in store for us! Thank you Playrix!

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

title: Homescapes

comments: I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

I paid the price to get the ads removed, because I like to support developers and because there were a LOT of ads. The ads were never removed. I have contacted the developers more than once and received no response. Then I contacted the Play Store and they rejected my claim. Now I have paid for the ads to be removed and they are still there at a level that makes the game unplayable. Worst customer service ever; what a waste of money. I will remember this developer and never download another of their apps.

Terrible game. I can't pay twice without having to sit through a full 30 second add. I found it faster to exit out the app and go back in to avoid adds. But there are just too many adds that it made it not fun after the first few goes.

WAY TOO MANY ADS! Its so frustrating that after three failures an ad plays for 30 seconds. Also, why are you asking for access to my storage and location and the ability to make and receive calls? As a developer, get with what your customers want. Then I'll consider buying something.

Far too many ads. One here and there is understandable but after every single try, you get an add. Definitely uninstalled for that reason. As far as the game itself, it's really fun and could be addicting but I spent more time trying to get through the ads than I did playing the game.

A friend purchased no ads, but the game still gives him ads, and the purchase was compete through Google, and they can't even give a refund or fix the app to match the purchase. They just stole the money and refuse to give it back. Also, if you're playing with either wifi or data, the game lags more than if you play with both of them off. Fix your support team and game, there's no reason a network connection should lag a game, that means somethings going on with the app, it doesn't happen with other apps...

description: The new Super Panther Hero is in town, Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery game is the new Super villain fighting game of the house. It will bring you a whole new story with the amazing twists and turns. It will take you to a ride of the millennium. Test the real badness in the Super Panther Hero. Super panther hero fights with city cops with the help of evil powers and escape in front of city police in this Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City game.Being bad is also a good thing. Enjoy the life of a bank robber in Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery. Play as a Super villain in Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City. Being a Villain not only mean to kill and steal but you also need to run for your own life. There are also so many life turning events in the game that you will not only play the game but will also live the game.Game Play:Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is exciting game with thrilling gameplay where you have left your old town and came to the city with a lot of dreams which you believed will come true. As you have landed on the bus stop some thugs tried to steal from you and you accidentally killed them with your power. They were the members of the Foot Clan a well-known Gangsters and Mafia organized Ganged that have all the good and the bad in their pockets.Even the Gods have the rivals so do the man. The rivals of the foot clans have seen what you can do and need to help them to rob the bank for them. Otherwise he will be handed over to the foot clan and will be executed. You will need to rob the bank. Sneak in to the bank at night and beat all in your way. Make sure you make it out alive coz police will be standing out to catch you.Beat them all and Escape in the world Fastest Super Car. Feel the need for fast speed and escape like smoke. Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery is not only running from the police but you will also need to out run the thugs and Gangsters.Lighting hero will also be looking for you everywhere so you need to escape the city before they all catch you. You need to escape the city as soon as possible. Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is the Super Panther Bank Robbery game.Key Features:‚Ä¢	Story mode with the most Amazing Story of the year.‚Ä¢	Game with the animated Cut Scene.‚Ä¢	New Game Changing Environment (Indoor and Out Door Environment).‚Ä¢	Super-Fast Cars.‚Ä¢	Amazing Game play and smooth controls.Being bad and the most furious Super Villain also means driving super cars, robbing a bank, money and all that money can buy. Enjoy the thug life of the Vice City as a Super Panther Hero. Ultimate Super Panther Villain has his own powers that can help him to escape the police and Gangsters of the city. Lighting Hero is the savior of the city you will also need to escape him as well. Lighting Hero is Super-fast that time seems to stop. You don‚Äôt need to be afraid as you have the power of a panther inside you. Save your life with the help of your evil powers and fight with speed hero in this Super Panther hero Bank Robbery: Crime City action game.

Beat them all and Escape in the world Fastest Super Car. Feel the need for fast speed and escape like smoke. Panther Super Villain Bank Robbery is not only running from the police but you will also need to out run the thugs and Gangsters.

Lighting hero will also be looking for you everywhere so you need to escape the city before they all catch you. You need to escape the city as soon as possible. Super Panther Hero Bank Robbery: Crime City is the Super Panther Bank Robbery game.

comments: If you like üç¨ Crush on Facebook? Then you will like this game even better. The graphics are cute and the üêü give you occasional hints as to what will make them super happy. And then you have that "Aha" moment. There it is.  The trap is set. Lol you are not continuing to play because it is addictive. You play in order to collect coins so you can buy stuff to make the little fish happy. üíò the graphics kind of a little like an underwater Farmville with the plants üêü and decorations you can get fort your aquarium. I do play with üé∂ turned off. Cute game so far.        Graphics make it better than Candy Crush.

With an easy guide, on 'How to play'. Once you get going its great fun. Dare I say quite addictive. Fantastic animations. Amazing back ground music. Plus, no app freezes either.  Its an 'A‚òÜ' from me at least.  Only, what would be a great idea. Is all the piggy bank jewels you build up, should be awarded for your hard efforts. Should not have to buy them back.  Only purchase jewels when desperate.

Great game but would love it more if it kept track of when you bought something . Like a little quantity number in the corner after you purchase a fish or decorations. Hard to save up to buy things for guests, sucks when you buy something you already have when trying to complete a task. Other then that it's a great game lol I enjoy playing it.

Great game. Challenging, fun, and addictive lol. I'm 32 and play this often so it's not just for kids . Give it a try it's very satisfying . Just wished you could add friends ... People that play whom you may not know so we all could help each other. That would make it more interactive and a lot more fun. No one I know plays so it would have to be other fellow fishermen üòâ

Fantastic game! It's great fun decorating the aqariums and the game board is very clear. The recent move of the boosters to the right hand side of the screen was a VERY bad decision, as I have accidentally used them when my hand has brushed against them - this has happened many times already. A good addition would be a marker indicating a purchased item.

Because you only get 5 lives and you make some levels with too few moves. It would be nice if you could interact more with your fish and tanks. The whole point of beating levels is to build up your tanks...but you can't do anything with them while waiting for lives. It would be a fantastic game if there was more to do within the tanks!

Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game!

Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. description: Stickman Destruction 4 Annihilation is a sequel to the legendary game of survival, where to make incredible tricks, driving different transport and getting into different crash! For the first time ever !‚òÖA lot of new locations and levels with different obstacles! ‚òÖNew design, which stickman games funs will definitely like!‚òÖAmazing tricks in ragdoll style! ‚òÖ Realistic destroy and crash!‚òÖ HD graphics which stickman games funs will definitely like!‚òÖExclusive soundtrack‚òÖ Hardcore gameplay and unique physics!Are you ready to break the laws of physics?Each level includes new tricks and new crash!
