comments: Graphics need an improvement, nothing drastic.  Musical score is great, just like the show.   Gameplay is diverse enough to keep you engaged. I would like to see mpre options for alliances in the future. Perhaps a deceptions option list where you can try to steal from other players without fighting. Stuff like that.   Otherwise enjoyable.

This game favors the higher level players or those willing to pay. You'll get top level 5 or 6 and get attacked by someone at least twice your level and lose all your resources. It'll take days for your forces to be healed cause it takes resources to heal them, which were stolen. Anyone you attack won't have much resources for you to steal cause they've either given up on the frame or too low of a level to have anything, so it's a huge waste of time. You can get a shield, but you have to buy what you can't get for free. It's a shame cause it's an okay game.
It's nice to not have packs pop up every time you go to a new area of game! Although, once I bound my account to Facebook,  lagging and crashing started to occur.

Dont waste your money on this game, game has bugs and push notifications doesnt warn you when another player attacks you, when using the ingame bug reports you only get a generic automated email with no follow up to solve the problem. This is not a free to play game. And even if you do spend money, the developers do not tend to problems or even send a mail or refund your money spent.

Game crashed and I lost all progress including $$$ spent. Developers will not reply to my repeated requests to resolve the issue. Many other players have had the exact same problem. I would recommend people stay away from this game

Fun similar to other games I've played, the GOT theme really makes that game fun. It's still relatively new, but bugs are minimal. Some annoyances, nothing game breaking. Game allows you to potentially conquer major cities in GOT, (kings landing, winterfell etc) and control them as a player. Although it's quite difficult. Pretty cool. It needs mor e crafting options, maybe a city wall troop placer, or garrison type option. Also the map is difficult to navigate, more aids wouldbe nice.

descriptionHTML:
Westeros is at war. Great houses clash, dragons rule the sky, and the army of the dead threatens the realm.  Live out your fantasy and join the war.  Build your house and raise your army as you navigate a dangerous political landscape.  Based on the award winning HBO series, Game of Thrones: Conquest allows players to become a Lord in Westeros and define a strategy for conquering the Seven Kingdoms. Winter is here and your enemy’s army will not wait to clash swords.  Wage war and join the battle today to capture the Iron Throne!

A TRUE GAME OF THRONES EXPERIENCE
“In the game of thrones, you win or you die.” - Cersei Lannister

-Become a lord of Westeros: Build your great house, create your sigil, and Fight for the Crown
-Interact with key characters from the hit HBO series including Jon Snow, Daenerys Targaryen, Petyr Baelish, Cersei Lannister and more.
-Capture 120+ iconic Seats of Power like Winterfell, Castle Black, Dragonstone, and King’s Landing
-Navigate the dangerous political landscape using the innovative Allegiance System to live out the fantasy of claiming The Iron Throne and -winning the Great War

THE SEVEN KINGDOMS WILL REMEMBER YOUR NAME
“It’s the family name that lives on. It’s all that lives on.” - Tywin Lannister

-Build your house and claim your territory to rise in political influence
-Raise your army and clash against rival lords to capture iconic Seats of Power
-Defend your strongholds, as each Seat of Power endows you with military and economic upgrades
-Dominate the map, clash with your enemies, and spread your influence

MAKE KINGS RISE AND FALL
“Fight every battle everywhere, always, in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend.” - Petyr Baelish

-Master the innovative social system that allows players to recruit bannermen, fight wars alongside your allies, and live out your fantasy of ruling The Seven Kingdoms
-Claim the Iron Throne - In a dynamic political world, choose between deception and loyalty as you shift your allegiances
-Reward those loyal to you with titles like Hand of the King and Master of Coin as you build your Small Council
-Bestow Seats of Power to your allies granting them special military and economic advantages


Only in Game of Thrones: Conquest can you become a lord of Westeros and navigate the dangerous political system as you Fight for the Crown. Interact with key characters and capture  iconic locations from the award winning HBO TV series. Dominate your enemies by using an innovative Allegiance System that allows you to recruit your friends as bannermen as you rise to take The Iron Throne.

LIVE THE FANTASY - PLAY NOW AND FIGHT FOR THE CROWN!

description: Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARSWe have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTSYou will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.REALISTIC TRAFFICStaying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!FREE TO PLAYThe Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.GAME FEATURES‚ñ∂ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles‚ñ∂ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!‚ñ∂ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.‚ñ∂ 100% Free-2-Play Missions‚ñ∂ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls‚ñ∂ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.

A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARS

We have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!

BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTS

You will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC

Staying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!

FREE TO PLAY

The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.

GAME FEATURES

▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles
▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!
▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view

Mount Batten
Plymouth

summary: Best realistic car driving! Explore a vast city in huge selection of cool cars!
title: Roundabout 2: A Real City Driving Parking Sim

comments: Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

Prestige Mega Corp, a soulless ride share company, is ripping off your drivers to make corporate pigs rich. Fight the corporate machine and TAKE BACK the city! With just a cab, a cabbie and a dream build a fleet of cabs, amass untold wealth, and become the ultimate taxi tycoon!

In SEGA’s all-new Crazy Taxi idle clicker just tap to unleash the mayhem. The more your driver’s deliver, the more cash you make! The crazier they drive the faster you earn. And the more you earn the happier you will be. So let the good times roll.

description: Battle royale with the zombie's hordes on screens of your devices! Collect resources in the nite and together with friends beat off hordes of the zombie and survive at nite! Fort nite Royale: battle in survival is a sandbox with the open world where players should survive, constantly battling among themselves for resources and also beating off nite attacks of the zombie. The constant research of the surrounding area and collecting the limited resources scattered according to the map of a sandbox is the key to success in this game. I loved this game and found it very fun. As someone who is currently learning Java, I can vouch that it's not as easy as it may seem, to make a full fledged game like this. I appreciate that the developer would not overflow it with ads but instead make it a choice to see ads in exchange for in game benefits. I think this game should get more attention

I'm an avid music gamer and I have to say for a mobile game it's graphics and choice of music is very nice. However, the reason I don't give it 5 stars is I was expecting the nodes that you collect or other gamplay aspect to be in tune with the music, like say button pressing games like tap tap sonic etc where you press the button in time with the music. The fact this game doesn't do that is a little off putting and I'm not sure how much I would play this game for that reason. Maybe they will implement this in later updates. The option to buy almost everything with in game currency rather than real money is a bonus, give you reason to play it more because you know you can unlock songs etc without forking your own money. Overall though still a good game!

It's a good game, obviously an upgrade from the original, just feel a bit bothered with some of the minor changes.  The fact that on the list of things to collect is only 2 items long instead of 4  That after about the 5th one collected, every item just appears on a formation instead of being spread.  And that you don't get power ups while playing anymore.  And why is addicted to you not here?

I like the game especially because there aren't many like it right now. Though it would be nice to see an update that lets you use other songs too. Even though it's avicci's app I mean the songs do get repetitive after playing for a long time

It's great, but not great enough. Graphics has drastically changed, new songs added (which i like it), but only one problem, why did you remove the feature that you will be healed up when you collected enough, uh things. Why tho? But anyway, a major upgrade to its predecessor. So thumbs up
description: There‚Äôs a party in space - and you‚Äôre invited! In collaboration with award-winning Hello There Games, Avicii proudly presents hit music game AVICII GRAVITY HD, where you can experience Avicii's latest and greatest hits through compelling and atmospheric gameplay.  In fast-paced AVICII GRAVITY HD, Avicii's galactic hits merge with intense gameplay into a uniquely immersive experience - and YOU decide how it all plays out! Your progress determines how the melodies build up, while the environment changes to match the music. Swipe, push and power up your ships to maximize your rides! Enter a flow-like state and ride through endless, artistic environments inspired by Avicii hits. Earn credits to unlock new ships, environments and power-ups. Better yet, you can access and immerse yourself in a variety of Avicii songs - in ways attainable only through this game. Preparing to play is exciting in itself, as slot machines determine the tokens and power-ups you receive for your next ride. Also, the store is loaded with consumables, credits and hit songs. And finally, daily challenges and achievements unlock new ships and upgrades, and will have you coming back for more!

descriptionHTML:
Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.
An addictive thrilling game “Scrolling Ball in Sky” landing on Google Play market now. The future door opens for you from the moment you tap on the screen.
The game features:
● Unique gameplay: help the balls rolling farther and farther away by swiping left or right.
● 3D scene design combined with rock music brings you addictive pleasure.
● Exciting levels: volcano scapes, city scape, desert scape, garden scape and rolling sky scape etc.!
● Fantastic balls: discover all the secrets it holds by rolling balls, or equips in rainbow shop.
● Invite your Facebook friends to challenge your unbeaten record!
Be attention to the roll ball story, you may get a chance to play spin wheel to obtain an unexpected surprise. Do not indulge in the game or you may costs 24 hours in rolling the balls. Very easy to play but very hard to reach the top records!
Scrolling Ball in Sky is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

description: Play Realms 1 & 2 for FREE. In-App Purchase Realms 3-9.Help Zee escape Samsara! Drop blocks of different shapes and properties into a realm of two mirrored dimensions, in this beautiful, reflective puzzle game with a twist‚Ä¶While playing in the park, Zee follows a squirrel through a portal to a world of echoes, inhabited by a shadow child. Surrounded by the unknown and trapped in a series of realms both confusing and dangerous, the youngsters must avoid slipping into the pool between dimensions, embarking on a voyage of discovery and awakening they share with the player, up and down staircases, through light and dark, across the upside-down and the right side-up to their eventual freedom.Features:‚Ä¢ Explore the reflected dimensions of 77 levels across 6 hand-detailed realms, each with hidden ‚ÄúEaster Eggs‚Äù to uncover‚Ä¢ Simple play mechanic ‚Äì choose, rotate and drop blocks and utilize their reflections‚Ä¢ Carefully paced advancement, new concepts introduced progressively ‚Ä¢ Blocks must be both balanced and will respond to gravity, falling towards the pool between the two dimensions, allowing asymmetric placements‚Ä¶‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¶Although later in the game, new types of block reflections may behave ‚Äúunusually‚Äù under gravity‚Ä¢ Environmental interaction includes falling stones, and thorns which grow on contact with Zee‚Äôs echo but shrivel at Zee‚Äôs own touch, allowing timed block movements to be set up‚Ä¢ Crafted with love by a team of experienced developers in New Zealand, featuring innovative puzzle design and a unique art and animation style
descriptionHTML:
Play Realms 1 & 2 for FREE. In-App Purchase Realms 3-9.

Help Zee escape Samsara! Drop blocks of different shapes and properties into a realm of two mirrored dimensions, in this beautiful, reflective puzzle game with a twist…

While playing in the park, Zee follows a squirrel through a portal to a world of echoes, inhabited by a shadow child. Surrounded by the unknown and trapped in a series of realms both confusing and dangerous, the youngsters must avoid slipping into the pool between dimensions, embarking on a voyage of discovery and awakening they share with the player, up and down staircases, through light and dark, across the upside-down and the right side-up to their eventual freedom.

Features:
• Explore the reflected dimensions of 77 levels across 6 hand-detailed realms, each with hidden “Easter Eggs” to uncover
• Simple play mechanic – choose, rotate and drop blocks and utilize their reflections
• Carefully paced advancement, new concepts introduced progressively
• Blocks must be both balanced and will respond to gravity, falling towards the pool between the two dimensions, allowing asymmetric placements…
• …Although later in the game, new types of block reflections may behave “unusually” under gravity
• Environmental interaction includes falling stones, and thorns which grow on contact with Zee’s echo but shrivel at Zee’s own touch, allowing timed block movements to be set up
• Crafted with love by a team of experienced developers in New Zealand, featuring innovative puzzle design and a unique art and animation style
developerAddress:
L2, 14-16 Maidstone Street
Grey Lynn
Auckland 1021
New Zealand
summary: Zee is lost in Samsara, a puzzling journey of beauty and confusion.
title: Samsara Game

descriptionHTML:
SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.

How to play:
- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.

Feature:
- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit
- 17 different types of cars
- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want
- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires
- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory
- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart
- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...
- New content coming soon!

Tips:
- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up
- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others
- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the best

The most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!

comments: The latest update has again reverted my progress while suddenly gifting me some toons I haven't earned. I don't understand what the Devs are trying to do with this, but what a mess
Please include tweety bird on the character. üòçüòçüòçüëçüëçüëç  Bad update though toon task can't be collected. What just happened? The heck, its too hard to level up. The pieces are too huge.

The new update has changed a lot of mechanics and features and it really feels odd from an old player and a Looney Tunes fan standpoint.  For instance, I might understand Porky Pig being moved to WB Studios, because he has had roles before such as a talent caster, but Road Runner?  Wile E. Coyote?  Ralph Wolf?  Really?  Even placing Marvin's house in WBS seems totally odd and questionable, that, ignoring the fact that the Space region is a thing in the universe.  The task mechanic also makes less sense.  One task point even for larger tasks?  And what about the Toons' houses?  They don't even change form after each upgrade and the "bigger loot" incentive still does not apply beyond Level 3.  Also, we kinda know for a fact that the wheels are rigged, but with the current update, you can't really make it more obvious.  I still love the game, but definitely less than before.
Love this game best game in the world and if you do an update make it that you can add six people in your team when you fight other people.

descriptionHTML:
“In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…”

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!

This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.

Features:
* Unique heroes, with unique ability.
* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.
* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.
* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!
* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.
* Many more features that you will find out in game.

comments: It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Took me a little while to get the hang of the controls but it's fun once you do. Could maybe do with some hints to help get the best body position in flight, as this took me a while to figure out. Otherwise, it's a good time sink.

Sometimes it makes no sense. You are coming from quailication as 7th, you jump to 2nd position so surely you cant finish worse than 8th? WRONG. You end up on 16th place which is impossible. There is no in between you either win or you finish 14th or lower. You have 30 pts lead in front of number 2. after 1st round, you slightly fail your 2nd jump, guess what? 18th place for you! If you jump for example 120m on a K90 in Q, you finish first because everyone jumped 20m less, sudennly in 1st round you need 130m to secure your first place because everone managed to jump extra 30m. All in all fun, but still needs a lot.
No idea how the take off works, seems to be a perfect sweet spot but no tutorials to help you find it. Deleted
Every time I land, I crash. Have tried everything possible, but still always crash.
It's diffrent I've only played 10 min and your asking for a rating. Can't give a fair rating if you don't get time to play lol

comments: I love that you don't lose troops while defending. The only problem is the cost to heal them is rediculous. There are many aggressive players that assault you early on in the game and unless you pay money it becomes difficult to maintain a stable civilization. I believe it would be better if there were cheaper or easier ways to gain resources for those whom don't pay to win. Thank you for the amazing game though! Love you guys and I will never quit playing!

I like the game but there is some bullying that happens. No limit on how many times a player can attack you. I was attacked 60 times in an hour by the same player killing every troop I had, cleaning out all my resources and destroyed one of my bases. It is just plain malicious. I have brought it up before and no one cares to do anything to fix it.  Update: I sent the above message months ago and received no response. This is classic "pay-to-play" tactics that promote bullying to get you to pay for upgrades. I won't be playing anymore.

I like the game. Has a few things that are a pain though. Like you cant share resources if they were bought, what does that even matter. I also dont like that your avatar can only be your facebook pic or an in game one..give me the option to upload my own pic without changing my facebook one.

Very unbalanced.  Dominated by purple, orange, and blue hordes. If you start as any other horde color you will be raided constantly with no support. Be prepared to spend lots of money on peace shields...

I don't understand the hype. 5 minutes into it and was already waiting an hour for an upgrade. No activities or anything else to do. One last thing, you only start with a 24 hour peace shield... n I'm out.

Love the game, spent a lot but sadly to many people make it so hard to grow in the game. They come and pick out the weak and destroy everything you spent weeks building. The same players will go ahead and hit you untill they kill all your troop and burn down all your huts so I think I'm going to quit the game and delete.  It's to that level of ridiculous, you spend your hard earned money and someone comes to put a fire to it making it a waste.

description: Description - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedCrash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's hero. His latest game may be largely more of the same that much is true.Gameplay - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedWarped is a drop-dead gorgeous game. The textures are impeccable, the animation's top-notch, and the special effects kick some serious booty. It sounds great too (thank heavens for more musical diversity, although I had nothing against Mark Mothersbaugh's score for part two). Play-wise it's the best action-platformer I've played since, well, the last Crash.On the issue of difficulty, Warped does come up one the easy side. It can be beaten by most experienced players in an afternoon. But it'll take days of play to truly complete the game, finding all of the items, and out-doing each stage's best time. Simple as it may seem, the time trial mode really does a lot to increase the game's longevity.So what if the game may not offer the most innovation I've ever seen from a sequel? It still brings enough freshness (in the form of its semi free-roaming portions and new play mechanics) and refinement to the table to suit my tastes just fine. Not only that, it's an incredibly fun game.Feature - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedWarped is very much like Crash Adventure previous two efforts at its core. Crash still runs, jumps, and spins his way though vertically and horizontally-scrolling 3D environments, classic platforming game style. But it also has its share of improvements. Among these are a wider variety of locales (eight in all, from ancient Egypt to the future), a second playable character, and the closest thing to free-roaming environments we're likely to see in a Crash title; a biplane dogfight and Jetski-style ocean outing are just two. All-in-all, there are more than 35 stages.There's also a time trial mode where you can compete against your buddies to see who can get through levels faster, plus unlock a secret warp room is you beat the top time in each. Crash Adventure has also taken strides to ensure that Dual Shock feedback and analog control are both supported in this sequel. You've no doubt played one of Crash's first two adventures, but how does his third stack up? Here's the verdict straight from our resident experts.
descriptionHTML:
Description - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped
Crash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's hero. His latest game may be largely more of the same that much is true.

Gameplay - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

Warped is a drop-dead gorgeous game. The textures are impeccable, the animation's top-notch, and the special effects kick some serious booty. It sounds great too (thank heavens for more musical diversity, although I had nothing against Mark Mothersbaugh's score for part two). Play-wise it's the best action-platformer I've played since, well, the last Crash.

On the issue of difficulty, Warped does come up one the easy side. It can be beaten by most experienced players in an afternoon. But it'll take days of play to truly complete the game, finding all of the items, and out-doing each stage's best time. Simple as it may seem, the time trial mode really does a lot to increase the game's longevity.

So what if the game may not offer the most innovation I've ever seen from a sequel? It still brings enough freshness (in the form of its semi free-roaming portions and new play mechanics) and refinement to the table to suit my tastes just fine. Not only that, it's an incredibly fun game.

Feature - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

Warped is very much like Crash Adventure previous two efforts at its core. Crash still runs, jumps, and spins his way though vertically and horizontally-scrolling 3D environments, classic platforming game style. But it also has its share of improvements. Among these are a wider variety of locales (eight in all, from ancient Egypt to the future), a second playable character, and the closest thing to free-roaming environments we're likely to see in a Crash title; a biplane dogfight and Jetski-style ocean outing are just two. All-in-all, there are more than 35 stages.

There's also a time trial mode where you can compete against your buddies to see who can get through levels faster, plus unlock a secret warp room is you beat the top time in each. Crash Adventure has also taken strides to ensure that Dual Shock feedback and analog control are both supported in this sequel. You've no doubt played one of Crash's first two adventures, but how does his third stack up? Here's the verdict straight from our resident experts.
summary: Crash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's
title: Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

comments: It is fun and challenging I find myself returning to play constantly to reach another level and build my team I love my mercs. I like having to find the materials too. Often going back to previous levels needing three stars for best advantage. Only problem I have is with cloud save I can't log in successfully and you must exit game to save data to your phone leave any other way all current data is gone. lOVE the game Good job.

The only way i would give this game 5 stars if there was an option to walk around instead of pressing an arrow to jump from cover to cover that ends up breaking cause your enemy's keep shooting at it. You bring all these amazing features but you take away the most important feature in any shooting game: walking around and taking cover where you like.

Its not a bad game, its actually just like the rest of the shooters on google play, which is point and shoot type of games like Zombie Frontier. I bet this game would be a lot more fun if you could walk around instead of just sitting In one place which is my only complaint. But otherwise overall this game is rather a bit fun if you are looking for a time killer.

Well executed game.  Items are there only for quick power freaks.  Looking forward to seeing the add one for the game.   PS- The English in the game isn't great and could use improvement.  It doesn't affect gameplay,  just a bit nerve wracking,  üòâ

So far it's the best game I've ever played than before. I love the graphics only that it took much time of reloading the bullets( I'm kinda an impatient person) but good job. I would totally recommend this game to my friends.
So far so good.. has vood graphics and game play its not hard but not easy and really havent had the need to spend yet i think devs have done great job keep up good work

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.
descriptionHTML:

Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. You are the world's last hope– you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

comments: Awesome Game!! Really I like this game. I dont even have words to describe it. Totally Fantastic... Whatever you say, this is totally cool. But I have a request...please add a column of legendary bikes. Like there is Common, Rares, Epics, and Specials , there should be a column of legendary. Waiting eagerly for the next update. Thanks a lot of making this fabulous game. And I would also like to appreciate the colours and graphics of this game. Thanks to the team for making this game. I advice this game to those who are looking for cool new games. Please install it and have FUN!!!! Dont just look at the pics, install and you'll be amazed.

Unless you have 16 hrs a day to put into this game to learn the track you will never have a very high score. Sometimes your vehicle doesnt respond the same as other runs also you may land on your tail and survive and the next time you die its up and down with the control if you keep going or die. And sometimes it tries to flip when you try to take off resulting in a quick death

Would and will give 5 star. But would like to see a gem counter. It gets rather tough keeping count.  Also I noticed sometimes that when come across the areas that have the 4-5 flat spiked walls that you have to time just right. When I die and revive they all seem to sync up together making it impossible to go under. I'll try and screenshot it next time. All in all great job and awesome game. Maybe a custom map feature for future. Possibly added to the no ads fee. Would be worth it then.

This game is my favorite game ever. The graphics are amazing, the controls are great. I can't seem to find anything wrong with this game. Me and my brother love playing it. I also like that it is available on Google Play Store and the Appstore on iPhones. My old phone was an iPhone, and when I got my new phone I was worried that I wouldn't be able to play it, but thanks to Ketchapp and Google Play Store, I can still play it!! Also, I would like to suggest that you add a feature that allows you to create your own level, but it's not something you have to add, it's just something I think would make the game absolutely perfect for me. Then again, you may already have that feature and I haven't seen it/gotten to it yet. Anyway, it's an amazing game, and I hope Ketchapp keeps making amazing games like this!!! (BTW, Ketchapp games are my absolute FAV.) Thank you!! üöòüòäüöò

This game would be great if it wasn't so laggy. Usually I would think it was an issue with phone storage or something, but I am on a new phone (note 8) and have only added a few apps in total. The game was smooth the first day or two but now the speed changes throughout play. The levels become impossible because the clock doesn't slow down even though the movement of the bike does.   Great concept and design. Hopefully that can be figured out if it is an issue on their side.

The game is great fun. I have been playing it for a few months and actually still play it. The only problem i seem to have with it. Is the laggish performance when i am connected to internet. The moment the internet is off then game runs more smoothly other than that. Still enjoy playing it. Though I must say it would be nice if there was a gem counter for each ride so i know how many I have collected. Otherwise great game

description: Dancing Line 2018 combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better. Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.Game rules:Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.Game features:1. Original background music2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap4. Music is the key to guide you5. Touch reaction, sound sense, and visual reaction is indispensable.6. 3D physical environment and moderate music.7. The line guide your tapping and dancing.Finally all i am going to say is use your Skillful eyes and Finger to guide and Tap the Snake Line through the colorful Maze and enjoy the journey into a Tunnel and Subway Rush full of surprises and remember not to Smash and Hit the walls and to Stack until you reach your temple.Enjoy Sonic Dancing Line 2018 and if there is anything feel free to contact me by e-mail.
descriptionHTML:
Dancing Line 2018 combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better.

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Game features:
1. Original background music
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories
3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap
4. Music is the key to guide you
5. Touch reaction, sound sense, and visual reaction is indispensable.
6. 3D physical environment and moderate music.
7. The line guide your tapping and dancing.

Finally all i am going to say is use your Skillful eyes and Finger to guide and Tap the Snake Line through the colorful Maze and enjoy the journey into a Tunnel and Subway Rush full of surprises and remember not to Smash and Hit the walls and to Stack until you reach your temple.

Enjoy Sonic Dancing Line 2018 and if there is anything feel free to contact me by e-mail.

comments: It was fun while it lasted. I was a big fan of the first game and this one was an awesome improvement. Unfortunately my game crashed after months of playing and forced me to play the tutorial again. UPDATE: After reaching out to Pikpok customer service they reset my story progress and gifted me several leveled up weapons that help balance out what I lost. I appreciate their rapid response and look forward to playing more!

After i reach chapter 4, suddenly all my weapons progress are gone,  then i contact the support team,  and they dont restore my previous weapons,  but they give me MORE than what i have before. üòÑ  I really happy with this,  and i really appreciate this.  You guys should try this game. This is AWESOME. Now it's time for me to kill more zombies üòé

3 stars because although the game is fantastic in what it is, it needs optimization for slightly older devices such as my S7 Edge. I had to scale down to 720p screen res to be able to get a good enough framerate. And yes. I already tried playing on low graphics settings (in-game) before i changed my phone's resolution.

I give you guys a 5-star rating. The graphics are amazing. And the weapons are cool. The only thing. I wish we didn't have to have the stamina constraints. And it would be awesome if I was able to keep the extra ammo I find so I have it for future levels. And also its a pain in the ass to level up the guns all the damn time

The idea of the game and the graphics are sweet, solid story line.... But what makes the game blow and not want to play anymore is how you have to level up the guns ( which is impossible to get to where you need to be with the weapons power level wise unless you drop cash.  You shoot a zombie in the head, that should be it....it shouldn't take 5 shots to kill the fucker. Wanna make it tougher? Just add more zombies then. Don't make them impossible to kill. You should also be able to reload when ever you want. At least the first few levels were fun.

OMG. I definitely LOVE this. Better than the first. The storyline had me excited. Now it's more fun running with a goal. Love everything. I'm on the lowest graphic settings but I still encounter minor lags. Oppo A83. But that's fine. I love how you can name your companion. Makes it more personal. Good job!

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!

Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?

FEATURES:
• Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges
• Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!
• Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot
• Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities
• Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!
• Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes
• Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the field

External storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all users

Into the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDead

comments: The game is alright. Still too early to give it a proper review. Only here to say that the timers are way too long in the early stages of the game. Waiting an hour or four for thirty seconds of gameplay. They need to work on scaling the progression timers. A game like this is okay with long timers in late game when you have more than one thing to keep track of. But for these pay to win games to be profitable it helps to bait the hook a little harder before making you wait hours for more content.

This game is a solid mix of "clash of clans" and "fallout shelter". Just like COC, you have to learn to let the timers cool off. The long term time investment can be very rewarding. The questing/pvp is also well done considering you can't choose what to attack or when during battle. Wholeheartedly a good game.

GG easy. everyone whining being pay to play this that. i never bought anything and I'm loving this, just need a little patience and you can do many things untill one thing gets done or upgraded. I'm high in ranks, have a clan dedicated to non buyers. its all cool. been over 4 months and i still play this its amazing! great work guys, keep it up and keep adding new stuff.

I love the game.  The thing is, this game just gets boring.  For example,  all you can do right now is to vanquish invasions. That's basically it. The portal is not always open.  The tournament? Well the match ups are way too oblivious.  My in game friends already have started quitting coz of these problems. You have to add something fun soon. Well it is still a fun game tho.

Would be a great game if it wasn't blatantly pay to win.  Everything in the game is designed to push you to pay.  I enjoyed it at first and usually toss about $15 since it was decent.   But then, the system pairs you with opponents you can't defeat which then hampers your progress greatly which then means you either pay or hope you don't get attacked too much and lose all your resources.

Been playing since early access relese. Game is very well built. But like all other games. The ads now bugged. The daily quest for the ad has never worked for me. Starts ad restarts app no credit. Oh well its an ad right. Well now your forcing me to watch them. Please fix So can i atleast finish those 2 daily quest?!?!?!  Also since update my androids menu buttons overlay all buttons on far right/left hand of screen depending on tilt. Phone is an LG stylo 3. Please address and i will rerate later.
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they‚Äôll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies‚Äô castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who‚Äôll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy ‚Äì the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You‚Äôve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes‚Ä¶ and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don‚Äôt like‚Ä¶ And you don‚Äôt like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
recentChanges: Fixed bugs and improved game performance
summary: Your castle, your rules!
title: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom

descriptionHTML:
Grow Phone
It’s a new concept game and growing the phone by your touch.

Game Released Event. When your phone becomes 2nd generation, limited Gift free jewels
(until Feb 28th)

■ Feature
- It’s possible to create your phone.
- It’s a new type game and not normal.
- Just by playing touch, you can stress relief.
- It’s possible to see the evolution of your phone.
- Try to play a battery acceleration and booster skill
- Easy to play and various modules

■ Information for enjoy playing
- Signal starts up from a battery.
- When the signal arrives to CPU, RAM, each module, the module is charged.
- When module gauge is full, it’s possible to get the gold
- It’s possible to get more gold by the module upgrade.
- It’s possible to send more signal to module by the battery upgrade.
- By the technical point (TP), it’s possible to upgrade the board.
- If upgrade the board, it’s possible to add new modules.
- Signal speed up by holding touch
- It’s possible to charge the battery fast by battery touch when the battery is out of battery.
- Press the bonus button that appears momentarily in the game. By the bonus button, buff is activated. Also, buff, it’s able to be accrued (Combo).

■ Caption
- If your phone is changed or uninstall the game, the data is deleted. You had batter push the save button.

■ Request Permission
- About the access permission Info.
Request access to permission follow

[Storage]
• Modify or delete SD card contents
• read the contents of your SD card
[Phone]
• read phone status and identity
• directly call phone numbers
[Contacts]
• read your contacts
• find accounts on the device

■ CS
- If you have install or playing problems, please contact to E-mail.
(help@mobile-game.co.kr) We're going to reply it ASAP.

■ Login error solution
1. Run 'Play Games' App
2. Go to 'setting' menu
3. Check on to 'Sign in to games automatically'

■Notice for Load and Save functions
- When you Save a Data, a previous data will be deleted if there is a previous data.
- When you Load a saved data, on going data will be deleted.

■ Brand page : http://mobile-game.co.kr/eng/
recentChanges: ‚óÜ Game released event : If you upgrade to 2nd generation main board, Bonus Jewels will be rewarded.
‚óÜ The battery can be charged to the full amount either auto-charging or click-charging method
‚óÜ Game Stabilization and known bug fix
summary: Released Event! Limited Gift free jewels.(until Feb 28th)
title: GrowPhone

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

Was addictive so I spent 25 over 5 weeks. Not knowing there are no rules on who hits who. High level player just continue to beat down on low level player. Nothing to even it out except spend money. Shame on you game designers

OH MY GOD!!! ARE YOU KIDDING ME WITH THIS?!?! I DOWNLOADED THE APP JUST TO RATE IT. YOUR AD, IS IDENTICAL TO CLASH OF CLANS!!!! THIS IS JUST PATHETIC. BEING A CLASH OF CLANS PLAYER, I FIND THIS VERY INSULTING AND DISRESPECTFUL. HAVE FUN WITH MY 1 STAR REVIEW!!!

No good for kids. Game is nothing special, there are 100s like it. Public chat is full of perverts and filth. Nothing you would want your kids exposed to. Currently no way to disable chat or report abuse so players can openly sexually harass other players. Safe for adults only.

This game is so bad. Everything is so slow paced and is very time consuming. I  would rather not waste my time. I mean REALLY! you do everything fricken one at a time. It be nice if there were at least 2 to four builders and omg building your dam army faster...  stopped at 3 mins in.

descriptionHTML:
The most exciting SLG Game ever! Raise your own army, lead your powerful DRAGON and KNIGHTS to fight for Glory in Blaze of Battle! Build a mighty City and battle against millions of players worldwide.

Play for FREE in this award-winning strategy game now! Join a mighty Alliance to chat and make friends with players all around the world. Train multiple troops and get yourself prepared for attacks against countless rivals.

The whole City is counting on you! Claim your Destiny Now!

FEATURES:

- Build and customize your own City.
- Raise a massive army to overwhelm your enemies with superior forces!
- Command the Dragon to lead your army to final victory.
- Summon the most faithful Knights to fight for your glory.
- Battle against millions of players worldwide.
- Join a mighty Alliance and Rally Wars against powerful rivals with allies!
- Talk and strategize with your friends in On-line Real-Time Chat.
- Conduct Researches to effectively boost the Development of your City.
- Forge powerful equipment for your Dragon. Bring up the greatest commander ever!
- Brutal Monsters roaming around, defeat them to get rare equipment ingredients totally for FREE!
- Participate in various events to win precious rewards every day.


NOTES:

- Network connection is required.
- Compatible with Android 4.0 or later.


CONTACT US:

If you have any problems or suggestions, please email us at bob_support@leyinetwork.com.
developerAddress: Room C 2/F., Capital Trade Centre, 62 Tsun Yip Street, Kowloon East, Hong Kong
recentChanges: Chance to give your Dragon a dashing new look finally arrives! Be sure to pick up an amazing Dragon Skin for your partner when it's available!
Alliance Event is getting a lot more fun - you're free to select your own Alliance Event Tasks!
- Gems Palace Max Level up to 7
- New Dragon Skills & Monsters Skills Added
summary: Build your empire, train your troops and go to battle with millions players.
title: Blaze of Battle

comments: Is it just me or does this happen to everyone? When I use a power up like 2X or instant bingo, does it land on the same number? I had an "instant bingo" land on B9 on three different cards (B9 was never called)! Same with most power ups! Just curious!!!

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

Okay, I play these games when I wake up and this one costs a fortune to play!!! Then, I have found with the challenges it doesnt give you credit as it should for utilizing the power ups you bought. I just used two for a challenge, and it never registered. If youre willing to dump money this is the ideal game  Oh and you cant reach support through the app to discuss these mistakes so....youre SOL when the game messes up. After spending oodles on this game, time to delete.

comments: i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

descriptionHTML:
Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life
🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels
🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand
🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places
🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others
🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room
🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day
🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved ones

Will you be there for Emily when she needs you most?

Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶

Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

description: This game made for you so don't wait to discover it.Happy strong wheel adventures is an amazing games, it's the time to start the most addictive game of all times ! It's the time to start playing it!Happy strong wheel adventures is a free game, full of adventures.Happy Wheels is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damageyour character.Happy Wheels is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csrbike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.Welcome to Happy Wheels A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dashand rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die.Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you‚Äôre nota fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop buttonto decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, Happy Wheels offers an exhilaratingmix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. comments: My partner is awesome and it doesn't out Trump you or play like a suicide bomber either. Tried the rest but this is the best for free guys. Awesome job. Asthetics is good and simple. Be great if you could put a 'speed slider' dial to slow gameplay down, so as my young master can play whilst learning. Superb guys n gals. This one is definitely worth trying. Beats Zelda's 'free game' she, wants to Trump you out most times.

Love this game! I've read lots of reviews and they kind of surprised me. This game seems to me to pretty accurately reflect Euchre when we play at home. Good hands, bad hands, balances out pretty evenly in the end. We don't use the "Going Under" feature, but it would sure be a help if you are stuck with at least 3 9s&10s to be able to switch with the pile!‚úî The gold circle with the D in it indicates the dealer. The Trump suit is put beside the player who called Trump. Fast, easy, fun!

Bots call Trump when they can't even take 2 tricks, so I'm constantly getting set or setting the other team. It's nice for practice to get use to thinking out probabilities, but that all goes out the window when a bot leads out with the 10 of trump on the first play. Bot logic needs a lot of help to make it realistic.

This game was and is great. I am not a big fan of the constant 5 second ads now though. I understand it is a free app that needs to be supported by ads but it is after every round now  I and I am losing interest because it takes too long to  I play now. I hope you get it sorted out though. Whenever my right calls Bauer and I lead with an offsuit Ace,they NEVER ever have that suit. If I am making it,that same Opponent to my right ALWAYS has an offsuit ace as the stopper . Becoming too predictable in that way. Also,I have never played euchre in real life where you order up your partner and they play too.

Nice Very cool.  Am using it to teach my teenage children the game :)  on the downside - it's not often I'm dealt a decent hand.  N sometimes my partner stuffs up big time (like what were they thinking) :) but then again so do I lol.

The A-I makes it impossible to win unless you play on easy mode. Table talk is an understatement...the cpu gets at least 5 viable loaner hands every game on medium or above and the partners always have just the right cards available. Not random at all and no skill required. Let the players play and don't load the cpu's hand every hand. Ugh
description: Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.Features:- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.- Statistics with your performance in the game.- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don‚Äôt get euchred!
descriptionHTML:
Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.

In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.

Features:

- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.
- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.
- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.
- Statistics with your performance in the game.
- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.

If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!

Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don’t get euchred!

description: Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game that will challenge you plenty, and encourage you to try just one more game.Roll it to the limit for the ultimate win with the Yahtzee Classic game. Now with a casino- cool dice, you're ready to roll!Yahtzee is a dice game, which was first marketed as "Yatzie" in the early 1940s. Yatzie was included in a game set called "LUCK - 15 Grand Dice Games".Dice games, by their very nature, tend to rely much more on luck than skill. But playing the odds and calculating probabilities are definitely skills that can help you win the game Yatzy. The objective of the game is to score high points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations. Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Once a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.Do the best dice combination in the this multiplayer Yahtzee game. Half of the fun of this game is to yell out the game's name if and when you roll one. A Yatzy occurs when a player rolls and all five dice are the same number. Special Yahtzee rule is, the first time you get a Yahtzee in a game it is worth 50 points (if you use it in the yahtzee slot). If you roll another Yahtzy after you have already got the 50 points (i.e., you didn‚Äôt take a zero), you will get a 100 point bonus.The Yahtzee scorecard contains 13 scoring boxes divided between two sections: 1) Upper section 2) Lower sectionNow play with your Facebook friends and with millions of Yahtzy players around the world.You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play.Unique combination of luck and strategy makes every game of yahtzee an exciting challenge.Dice games are not only simple, but actually a lot of fun, regardless of whether you‚Äôre a child or an adult.If you're looking for some quick, light fun then yahtzee is the game for you.Download it for free today and have hours of fun. ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ Yahtzee Features‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚úî Fast-paced, competitive and fun - for free!‚úî Play with Facebook Friends or as Guest ‚úî Create Private Room and Invite Friends and Family‚úî Play with players across the worldAny suggestions? descriptionHTML:
Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game that will challenge you plenty, and encourage you to try just one more game.

Roll it to the limit for the ultimate win with the Yahtzee Classic game. Now with a casino- cool dice, you're ready to roll!

Yahtzee is a dice game, which was first marketed as "Yatzie" in the early 1940s.

Yatzie was included in a game set called "LUCK - 15 Grand Dice Games".

Dice games, by their very nature, tend to rely much more on luck than skill. But playing the odds and calculating probabilities are definitely skills that can help you win the game Yatzy.

The objective of the game is to score high points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations.

Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Once a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.

Do the best dice combination in the this multiplayer Yahtzee game. Half of the fun of this game is to yell out the game's name if and when you roll one. A Yatzy occurs when a player rolls and all five dice are the same number.

Special Yahtzee rule is, the first time you get a Yahtzee in a game it is worth 50 points (if you use it in the yahtzee slot). If you roll another Yahtzy after you have already got the 50 points (i.e., you didn’t take a zero), you will get a 100 point bonus.

The Yahtzee scorecard contains 13 scoring boxes divided between two sections:
1) Upper section
2) Lower section

Now play with your Facebook friends and with millions of Yahtzy players around the world.

You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play.

Unique combination of luck and strategy makes every game of yahtzee an exciting challenge.

Dice games are not only simple, but actually a lot of fun, regardless of whether you’re a child or an adult.

If you're looking for some quick, light fun then yahtzee is the game for you.

Download it for free today and have hours of fun.

 ◆◆◆◆ Yahtzee Features◆◆◆◆

✔ Fast-paced, competitive and fun - for free!
✔ Play with Facebook Friends or as Guest
✔ Create Private Room and Invite Friends and Family
✔ Play with players across the world

Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you for making this game better.

Enjoy playing Yahtzee!!

Please don't forget to Rate and Review Yahtzee, we aim to make it one of the best board games out there
